arabicText: رَبِّ اِنِّىْٓ اَعُوْذُ بِكَ اَنْ اَسْـــَٔـلَكَ مَا لَيْسَ لِيْ بِهٖ عِلْمٌ ۭ وَاِلَّا تَغْفِرْ لِيْ وَتَرْحَمْنِيْٓ اَكُنْ مِّنَ الْخٰسِرِيْنَ
englishTranslation: O my Lord! I seek refuge with You from asking You that of which I have no knowledge. And unless You forgive me and have Mercy on me, I would indeed be one of the losers.
germanTranslation: O mein Herr! Ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir, um Dich nicht um etwas zu bitten, wovon ich kein Wissen habe. Und wenn Du mir nicht vergibst und Dich meiner erbarmst, werde ich wahrlich zu den Verlierern gehören.
transliteration: Rabbi Inneee A-o’od’u Bika An As-alaka Maa Laysa Lee Bihee I’lm Wa Illaa Taghfirlee Wa Tarh’amneee Akum Minal Khaasireen
turkishTranslation: Ey Rabbim! Bilgim olmayan bir şeyi Senden istemekten Sana sığınırım. Eğer beni bağışlamaz ve bana merhamet etmezsen, şüphesiz ki kaybedenlerden olurum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، خَلَقْتَنِي وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ، وَأَنَا عَلَى عَهْدِكَ وَوَعْدِكَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُ، أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا صَنَعْتُ، أَبُوءُ لَكَ بِنِعْمَتِكَ عَلَيَّ، وَأَبُوءُ بِذَنْبِي، فَاغْفِرْ لِي، فَإِنَّهُ لَا يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ.
englishTranslation: O Allah, You are my Lord, none has the right to be worshipped except You. You created me and I am Your servant, and I abide to Your covenant and promise as best I can. I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done. I acknowledge Your favour upon me and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for verily none can forgive sin except You.
germanTranslation: O Allah, Du bist mein Herr, es gibt keinen Gott außer Dir. Du hast mich erschaffen und ich bin Dein Diener, und ich halte mich so gut ich kann an Deinen Bund und Dein Versprechen. Ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor dem Bösen dessen, was ich getan habe. Ich erkenne Deine Gunst an mir an und ich erkenne meine Sünde an, so vergib mir, denn wahrlich, niemand kann Sünden vergeben außer Dir.
transliteration: Allahumma anta rabbi la ilaha illa anta, khalaqtani wa ana abduka, wa ana 'ala 'ahdika wa wa'dika ma istata'tu, a'udhu bika min sharri ma sana'tu, aboo'u laka bini'matika 'alayya, wa aboo'u laka bidhanbi faghfir li fa innahu la yaghfiru adhdhunuba illa anta.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Sen benim Rabbimsin. Senden başka ilah yoktur. Beni Sen yarattın ve ben Senin kulunum. Gücüm yettiğince Senin ahdine ve vaadine sadık kalıyorum. Yaptığım kötülüklerden Sana sığınıyorum. Üzerimdeki nimetini kabul ediyorum ve günahımı itiraf ediyorum. Beni bağışla, çünkü günahları ancak Sen bağışlarsın.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِي ظُلْمًا كَثِيرًا، وَلَا يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، فَاغْفِرْ لِي مَغْفِرَةً مِنْ عِنْدِكَ، وَارْحَمْنِي، إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْغَفُورُ الرَّحِيمُ.
englishTranslation: O Allah, I have greatly wronged myself, and none forgives sins but You. So forgive me with forgiveness from You, and have mercy on me. Indeed, You are the Forgiving, the Merciful.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich habe mir selbst großes Unrecht zugefügt, und niemand vergibt Sünden außer Dir. So vergib mir mit Deiner Vergebung und erbarme Dich meiner. Wahrlich, Du bist der Vergebende, der Barmherzige.
transliteration: Allahumma inni zalamtu nafsi zulman kathiran, wa la yaghfiru adhdhunuba illa anta, faghfir li maghfiratan min 'indika, warhamni, innaka anta al-Ghafooru ar-Raheem.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Ben nefsime çok zulmettim ve günahları ancak Sen bağışlarsın. O halde beni bağışla ve bana merhamet et. Şüphesiz Sen, çok bağışlayan ve çok merhamet edensin.

arabicText: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي، وَتُبْ عَلَيَّ، إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ التَّوَّابُ الْغَفُورُ.
englishTranslation: My Lord, forgive me and accept my repentance. Indeed, You are the Accepter of Repentance, the Most Forgiving.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, vergib mir und nimm meine Reue an. Wahrlich, Du bist der Reue-Annehmende, der Allvergebende.
transliteration: Rabbi ighfir li wa tub 'alayya, innaka anta at-Tawwabu al-Ghafoor.
turkishTranslation: Rabbim! Beni bağışla ve tövbemi kabul et. Şüphesiz Sen, tövbeleri kabul eden ve çok bağışlayansın.

arabicText: رَبَّنَا ظَلَمْنَا أَنْفُسَنَا، وَإِنْ لَمْ تَغْفِرْ لَنَا وَتَرْحَمْنَا، لَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ الْخَاسِرِينَ.
englishTranslation: Our Lord, we have wronged ourselves, and if You do not forgive us and have mercy upon us, we will surely be among the losers.
germanTranslation: Unser Herr, wir haben uns selbst Unrecht zugefügt, und wenn Du uns nicht vergibst und Dich unser nicht erbarmst, werden wir gewiss zu den Verlierern gehören.
transliteration: Rabbana zalamna anfusana, wa in lam taghfir lana wa tarhamna, lanakoonanna mina al-khasireen.
turkishTranslation: Rabbimiz! Biz kendimize zulmettik. Eğer bizi bağışlamaz ve bize merhamet etmezsen, kesinlikle kaybedenlerden oluruz.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي ذَنْبِي كُلَّهُ، دِقَّهُ وَجِلَّهُ، وَأَوَّلَهُ وَآخِرَهُ، وَعَلَانِيَتَهُ وَسِرَّهُ.
englishTranslation: O Allah, forgive me all my sins, the minor and the major, the first and the last, the apparent and the hidden.
germanTranslation: O Allah, vergib mir all meine Sünden, die kleinen und die großen, die ersten und die letzten, die offensichtlichen und die verborgenen.
transliteration: Allahumma ighfir li dhanbi kullahu, diqqahu wa jillahu, wa awwalahu wa akhirahu, wa 'alaniyatahu wa sirrahu.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Bütün günahlarımı, küçüğünü ve büyüğünü, ilkini ve sonunu, gizlisini ve açığını bağışla.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِرِضَاكَ مِنْ سَخَطِكَ، وَبِمُعَافَاتِكَ مِنْ عُقُوبَتِكَ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْكَ، لَا أُحْصِي ثَنَاءً عَلَيْكَ، أَنْتَ كَمَا أَثْنَيْتَ عَلَى نَفْسِكَ.
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in Your pleasure from Your anger, and in Your forgiveness from Your punishment. I seek refuge in You from You. I cannot enumerate Your praise; You are as You have praised Yourself.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht in Deinem Wohlgefallen vor Deinem Zorn und in Deiner Vergebung vor Deiner Strafe. Ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Dir. Ich kann Dein Lob nicht aufzählen; Du bist, wie Du Dich selbst gelobt hast.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu biridaka min sakhatika, wa bimu'afatika min 'uqubatika, wa a'udhu bika minka. La uhsi thana'an 'alayka, anta kama athnayta 'ala nafsik.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senin rızana, gazabından; affına, azabından sığınırım. Senden Sana sığınırım. Seni övgüyle anmakta acizim; Sen, kendini övdüğün gibisin.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْتَغْفِرُكَ لِذَنْبِي وَأَسْأَلُكَ رَحْمَتَكَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for forgiveness for my sin and I ask You for Your mercy.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Vergebung für meine Sünde und ich bitte Dich um Deine Barmherzigkeit.
transliteration: Allahumma inni astaghfiruka lidhanbi wa as'aluka rahmatak.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Günahım için Senden bağışlanma diliyorum ve rahmetini istiyorum.

arabicText: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَارْحَمْنِي وَتُبْ عَلَيَّ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ
englishTranslation: My Lord, forgive me, have mercy on me, and accept my repentance. Indeed, You are the Accepter of repentance, the Merciful.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, vergib mir, erbarme Dich meiner und nimm meine Reue an. Wahrlich, Du bist der Reue-Annehmende, der Barmherzige.
transliteration: Rabbi ighfir li warhamni watub 'alayya innaka anta at-Tawwabu ar-Raheem.
turkishTranslation: Rabbim! Beni bağışla, bana merhamet et ve tövbemi kabul et. Şüphesiz Sen, tövbeleri kabul eden ve merhametli olansın.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَاهْدِنِي وَارْزُقْنِي
englishTranslation: O Allah, forgive me, guide me, and provide for me.
germanTranslation: O Allah, vergib mir, leite mich und versorge mich.
transliteration: Allahumma ighfir li wahdini warzuqni.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Beni bağışla, bana hidayet ver ve beni rızıklandır.

arabicText: رَبَّنَا اغْفِرْ لَنَا وَلِإِخْوَانِنَا الَّذِينَ سَبَقُونَا بِالْإِيمَانِ
englishTranslation: Our Lord, forgive us and our brothers who preceded us in faith.
germanTranslation: Unser Herr, vergib uns und unseren Brüdern, die uns im Glauben vorausgegangen sind.
transliteration: Rabbana ighfir lana wali-ikhwanina alladhina sabaquna bil-eemaan.
turkishTranslation: Rabbimiz! Bizi ve bizden önce iman etmiş kardeşlerimizi bağışla.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي خَطِيئَتِي وَجَهْلِي وَإِسْرَافِي فِي أَمْرِي
englishTranslation: O Allah, forgive me my errors, my ignorance, and my excesses in my affairs.
germanTranslation: O Allah, vergib mir meine Fehler, meine Unwissenheit und meine Ausschweifungen in meinen Angelegenheiten.
transliteration: Allahumma ighfir li khati'ati wa jahli wa israfi fi amri.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Hatalarımı, cehaletimi ve işlerimdeki aşırılıklarımı bağışla.

arabicText: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الْحِسَابُ
englishTranslation: My Lord, forgive me, my parents, and the believers on the Day the account is established.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, vergib mir, meinen Eltern und den Gläubigen am Tag der Abrechnung.
transliteration: Rabbi ighfir li waliwalidayya walilmu'mineena yawma yaqoomu al-hisaab.
turkishTranslation: Rabbim! Beni, anne-babamı ve hesap gününde müminleri bağışla.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي ذَنْبِي وَوَسِّعْ لِي فِي دَارِي وَبَارِكْ لِي فِي رِزْقِي
englishTranslation: O Allah, forgive me my sin, expand for me my home, and bless me in my provision.
germanTranslation: O Allah, vergib mir meine Sünde, erweitere mein Zuhause und segne meinen Lebensunterhalt.
transliteration: Allahumma ighfir li dhanbi, wa wassi' li fi dari, wa barik li fi rizqi.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Günahımı bağışla, evimi genişlet ve rızkımı bereketlendir.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي مَا قَدَّمْتُ وَمَا أَخَّرْتُ وَمَا أَسْرَرْتُ وَمَا أَعْلَنْتُ
englishTranslation: O Allah, forgive me for what I have done earlier and later, what I have done secretly and openly.
germanTranslation: O Allah, vergib mir, was ich früher und später getan habe, was ich im Verborgenen und offen getan habe.
transliteration: Allahumma ighfir li ma qaddamtu wa ma akhkhartu wa ma asrartu wa ma a'lantu.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Önceden ve sonradan yaptıklarımı, gizli ve açık işlediğim günahları bağışla.

arabicText: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِمَنْ دَخَلَ بَيْتِيَ مُؤْمِنًا
englishTranslation: My Lord, forgive me, my parents, and whoever enters my house a believer.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, vergib mir, meinen Eltern und jedem Gläubigen, der mein Haus betritt.
transliteration: Rabbi ighfir li waliwalidayya waliman dakhala baytiya mu'minan.
turkishTranslation: Rabbim! Beni, anne-babamı ve evime mümin olarak girenleri bağışla.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَارْحَمْنِي وَاجْبُرْنِي وَاهْدِنِي وَارْزُقْنِي
englishTranslation: O Allah, forgive me, have mercy on me, strengthen me, guide me, and provide for me.
germanTranslation: O Allah, vergib mir, erbarme Dich meiner, stärke mich, leite mich und versorge mich.
transliteration: Allahumma ighfir li warhamni wajburni wahdini warzuqni.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Beni bağışla, bana merhamet et, beni güçlendir, bana hidayet ver ve beni rızıklandır.

arabicText: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَهَبْ لِي مُلْكًا لَا يَنْبَغِي لِأَحَدٍ مِنْ بَعْدِي ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْوَهَّابُ
englishTranslation: My Lord, forgive me and grant me a kingdom such as will not belong to anyone after me. Indeed, You are the Bestower.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, vergib mir und gewähre mir ein Königreich, wie es niemandem nach mir zustehen wird. Wahrlich, Du bist der Großzügige.
transliteration: Rabbi ighfir li wahab li mulkan la yanbaghi li ahadin min ba'di, innaka anta al-Wahhab.
turkishTranslation: Rabbim! Beni bağışla ve benden sonra kimseye nasip olmayacak bir mülk ver. Şüphesiz Sen, çok bağışta bulunansın.

arabicText: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْهِ
englishTranslation: Glory be to Allah and praise Him. I seek forgiveness from Allah and repent to Him.
germanTranslation: Preis sei Allah und Lob sei Ihm. Ich suche Vergebung bei Allah und bereue vor Ihm.
transliteration: SubhanAllahi wa bihamdihi, astaghfirullah wa atubu ilayh
turkishTranslation: Allah'ı hamd ile tesbih ederim. Allah'tan bağışlanma diler ve O'na tövbe ederim.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ بِأَنَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدَ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ وَحْدَكَ لَا شَرِيكَ لَكَ الْمَنَّانُ يَا بَدِيعَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ يَا ذَا الْجَلَالِ وَالْإِكْرَامِ يَا حَيُّ يَا قَيُّومُ اغْفِرْ لِي ذُنُوبِي
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You by virtue of the fact that all praise is Yours; there is none worthy of worship but You alone, with no partner; the Bestower of favors, O Originator of the heavens and earth, O Possessor of majesty and honor, O Ever-Living, O Self-Sustaining, forgive my sins.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich aufgrund der Tatsache, dass alles Lob Dir gehört; es gibt keinen Anbetungswürdigen außer Dir allein, ohne Partner; der Gewährer von Gunstbezeigungen, O Schöpfer der Himmel und der Erde, O Besitzer von Majestät und Ehre, O Ewiglebende, O Selbst-Erhaltende, vergib meine Sünden.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka bi-anna lakal-hamd, la ilaha illa ant, wahdaka la sharika lak, al-Mannan, ya Badi'as-samawati wal-ard, ya Dhal-jalali wal-ikram, ya Hayyu ya Qayyum, ighfir li dhunubi
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Hamdin yalnızca Sana mahsus olduğu, Senden başka ilah olmadığı, ortağın bulunmadığı, nimetler veren, göklerin ve yerin yaratıcısı, celal ve ikram sahibi, hayy ve kayyum olan Senin hakkın için günahlarımı bağışla.

arabicText: رَبَّنَا لَا تُؤَاخِذْنَا إِن نَّسِينَا أَوْ أَخْطَأْنَا
englishTranslation: Our Lord, do not hold us accountable if we forget or make a mistake.
germanTranslation: Unser Herr, halte uns nicht zur Rechenschaft, wenn wir vergessen oder einen Fehler machen.
transliteration: Rabbana la tu'akhidhna in nasina aw akhta'na
turkishTranslation: Rabbimiz! Unuttuk veya yanıldıysak bizi hesaba çekme.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ الْمَلِكُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ أَنْتَ رَبِّي وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِي وَاعْتَرَفْتُ بِذَنْبِي فَاغْفِرْ لِي ذُنُوبِي جَمِيعًا إِنَّهُ لَا يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, You are the Sovereign, there is none worthy of worship but You. You are my Lord and I am Your servant. I have wronged myself and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive all my sins, for none forgives sins but You.
germanTranslation: O Allah, Du bist der Souverän, es gibt keinen Anbetungswürdigen außer Dir. Du bist mein Herr und ich bin Dein Diener. Ich habe mir selbst Unrecht getan und ich gestehe meine Sünde, also vergib mir all meine Sünden, denn niemand vergibt Sünden außer Dir.
transliteration: Allahumma antal-Malik, la ilaha illa ant, anta Rabbi wa ana 'abduk, zalamtu nafsi wa'taraftu bidhanbi, faghfir li dhunubi jami'an, innahu la yaghfirudh-dhunuba illa ant
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Sen Melik'sin, Senden başka ilah yoktur. Sen benim Rabbimsin, ben de Senin kulunum. Kendime zulmettim ve günahımı itiraf ediyorum. Bütün günahlarımı bağışla, çünkü günahları ancak Sen bağışlarsın.

arabicText: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ الْعَظِيمَ الَّذِي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْهِ
englishTranslation: I seek forgiveness from Allah the Almighty, besides Whom there is none worthy of worship, the Ever-Living, the Self-Sustaining, and I repent to Him.
germanTranslation: Ich suche Vergebung bei Allah, dem Allmächtigen, neben Dem es keinen Anbetungswürdigen gibt, dem Ewiglebenden, dem Selbst-Erhaltenden, und ich bereue vor Ihm.
transliteration: Astaghfirullahal-'Adheem alladhi la ilaha illa Huwal-Hayyul-Qayyum wa atubu ilayh
turkishTranslation: Kendisinden başka ilah olmayan, Hayy ve Kayyum olan yüce Allah'tan bağışlanma diler ve O'na tövbe ederim.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنَ الْخَيْرِ كُلِّهِ عَاجِلِهِ وَآجِلِهِ مَا عَلِمْتُ مِنْهُ وَمَا لَمْ أَعْلَمْ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الشَّرِّ كُلِّهِ عَاجِلِهِ وَآجِلِهِ مَا عَلِمْتُ مِنْهُ وَمَا لَمْ أَعْلَمْ وَأَسْأَلُكَ الْجَنَّةَ وَمَا قَرَّبَ إِلَيْهَا مِنْ قَوْلٍ أَوْ عَمَلٍ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ النَّارِ وَمَا قَرَّبَ إِلَيْهَا مِنْ قَوْلٍ أَوْ عَمَلٍ وَأَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ خَيْرِ مَا سَأَلَكَ عَبْدُكَ وَرَسُولُكَ مُحَمَّدٌ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا اسْتَعَاذَكَ مِنْهُ عَبْدُكَ وَرَسُولُكَ مُحَمَّدٌ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ وَأَسْأَلُكَ مَا قَضَيْتَ لِي مِنْ أَمْرٍ أَنْ تَجْعَلَ عَاقِبَتَهُ رُشْدًا
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for all that is good, in this world and the next, what I know and what I do not know. I seek refuge in You from all that is evil, in this world and the next, what I know and what I do not know. I ask You for Paradise and for that which brings one nearer to it, in word and deed. I seek refuge in You from Hell and from that which brings one nearer to it, in word and deed. I ask You for the good that Your servant and Messenger Muhammad (peace be upon him) asked of You, and I seek refuge in You from the evil from which Your servant and Messenger Muhammad (peace be upon him) sought refuge. I ask You to make the outcome of all my affairs good.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um alles Gute, in dieser Welt und im Jenseits, was ich weiß und was ich nicht weiß. Ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor allem Bösen, in dieser Welt und im Jenseits, was ich weiß und was ich nicht weiß. Ich bitte Dich um das Paradies und um das, was einem näher dazu bringt, in Wort und Tat. Ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor der Hölle und vor dem, was einem näher dazu bringt, in Wort und Tat. Ich bitte Dich um das Gute, das Dein Diener und Gesandter Muhammad (Friede sei mit ihm) von Dir erbeten hat, und ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor dem Übel, vor dem Dein Diener und Gesandter Muhammad (Friede sei mit ihm) Zuflucht suchte. Ich bitte Dich, das Ergebnis all meiner Angelegenheiten gut sein zu lassen.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka minal-khayri kullihi 'ajilihi wa ajilihi ma 'alimtu minhu wa ma lam a'lam, wa a'udhu bika minash-sharri kullihi 'ajilihi wa ajilihi ma 'alimtu minhu wa ma lam a'lam, wa as'alukal-jannata wa ma qarraba ilayha min qawlin aw 'amalin, wa a'udhu bika minan-nari wa ma qarraba ilayha min qawlin aw 'amalin, wa as'aluka min khayri ma sa'alaka 'abduka wa rasuluka Muhammadun sallallahu 'alayhi wa sallam, wa a'udhu bika min sharri mast'a'adha minhu 'abduka wa rasuluka Muhammadun sallallahu 'alayhi wa sallam, wa as'aluka ma qadayta li min amrin an taj'ala 'aqibatahu rushda
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Bildiğim ve bilmediğim bütün hayırları, dünya ve ahirete ait olanları Senden istiyorum. Bildiğim ve bilmediğim bütün şerlerden, dünya ve ahirete ait olanlardan Sana sığınıyorum. Cenneti ve beni ona yaklaştıracak söz ve amelleri Senden istiyorum. Cehennemden ve beni ona yaklaştıracak söz ve amellerden Sana sığınıyorum. Kulun ve elçin Muhammed'in (sallallahu aleyhi ve sellem) Senden istediği hayırları istiyorum. Kulun ve elçin Muhammed'in (sallallahu aleyhi ve sellem) Sana sığındığı şerlerden Sana sığınıyorum. Hakkımda takdir ettiğin her işin sonucunu hayırlı kılmanı istiyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ وَالْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ وَالْبُخْلِ وَالْجُبْنِ وَضَلَعِ الدَّيْنِ وَغَلَبَةِ الرِّجَالِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from grief and sadness, from weakness and laziness, from miserliness and cowardice, from being overcome by debt and overpowered by men.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Kummer und Traurigkeit, vor Schwäche und Faulheit, vor Geiz und Feigheit, davor, von Schulden überwältigt zu werden und von Männern beherrscht zu werden.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazan, wal-'ajzi wal-kasal, wal-bukhli wal-jubn, wa dala'id-dayn wa ghalabatir-rijal
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Kederden, üzüntüden, acizlikten, tembellikten, cimrilikten, korkaklıktan, borç yükünden ve insanların baskısından Sana sığınırım.

arabicText: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
englishTranslation: Our Lord, give us in this world good and in the Hereafter good and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.
germanTranslation: Unser Herr, gib uns im Diesseits Gutes und im Jenseits Gutes und bewahre uns vor der Strafe des Feuers.
transliteration: Rabbana atina fid-dunya hasanatan wa fil-akhirati hasanatan wa qina 'adhaban-nar
turkishTranslation: Rabbimiz! Bize dünyada iyilik ver, ahirette de iyilik ver ve bizi cehennem azabından koru.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْهُدَى وَالتُّقَى وَالْعَفَافَ وَالْغِنَى
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for guidance, piety, chastity and self-sufficiency.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Rechtleitung, Gottesfurcht, Keuschheit und Unabhängigkeit.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'alukal-huda wat-tuqa wal-'afafa wal-ghina
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senden hidayet, takva, iffet ve gönül zenginliği istiyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا عَمِلْتُ وَمِنْ شَرِّ مَا لَمْ أَعْمَلْ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done and the evil of what I have not done.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor dem Übel dessen, was ich getan habe, und dem Übel dessen, was ich nicht getan habe.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min sharri ma 'amiltu wa min sharri ma lam a'mal.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, yaptıklarımın şerrinden ve yapmadıklarımın şerrinden sana sığınırım.

arabicText: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
englishTranslation: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.
germanTranslation: Ich suche Zuflucht in den vollkommenen Worten Allahs vor dem Bösen dessen, was Er erschaffen hat.
transliteration: A'udhu bi kalimatillahi at-tammati min sharri ma khalaq.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ın mükemmel kelimelerine sığınırım, yarattıklarının şerrinden.

arabicText: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
englishTranslation: In the name of Allah, with whose name nothing can harm on earth or in heaven, and He is the All-Hearing, All-Knowing.
germanTranslation: Im Namen Allahs, mit dessen Namen nichts auf der Erde oder im Himmel Schaden zufügen kann, und Er ist der Allhörende, der Allwissende.
transliteration: Bismillahi alladhi la yadurru ma'as-mihi shay'un fil-ardi wa la fis-sama'i wa huwas-Sami'ul-Alim.
turkishTranslation: Yerde ve gökte ismiyle hiçbir şeyin zarar veremeyeceği Allah'ın adıyla. O, işitendir, bilendir.

arabicText: حَسْبِيَ اللَّهُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَهُوَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ
englishTranslation: Allah is sufficient for me, there is no god but Him. In Him I place my trust, and He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne.
germanTranslation: Allah genügt mir, es gibt keinen Gott außer Ihm. Auf Ihn verlasse ich mich, und Er ist der Herr des gewaltigen Thrones.
transliteration: Hasbiyallahu la ilaha illa huwa, 'alayhi tawakkaltu, wa huwa Rabbul-'arshil-'azim.
turkishTranslation: Allah bana yeter, O'ndan başka ilah yoktur. Ben O'na güvendim ve O, büyük Arş'ın Rabbidir.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَفْوَ وَالْعَافِيَةَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for forgiveness and well-being in this world and the Hereafter.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Vergebung und Wohlergehen im Diesseits und im Jenseits.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'alukal-'afwa wal-'afiyata fid-dunya wal-akhirah.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, senden dünya ve ahirette af ve afiyet diliyorum.

arabicText: أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ
englishTranslation: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed Satan.
germanTranslation: Ich suche Zuflucht bei Allah vor dem verfluchten Satan.
transliteration: A'udhu billahi minash-shaytanir-rajim.
turkishTranslation: Kovulmuş şeytandan Allah'a sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ، وَالْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ، وَالْجُبْنِ وَالْبُخْلِ، وَضَلَعِ الدَّيْنِ وَغَلَبَةِ الرِّجَالِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from grief and sorrow, from weakness and laziness, from cowardice and miserliness, from being overwhelmed by debt and overpowered by men.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Kummer und Trauer, vor Schwäche und Faulheit, vor Feigheit und Geiz, vor Schuldenlast und der Unterdrückung durch Menschen.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazan, wal-'ajzi wal-kasal, wal-jubni wal-bukhl, wa dal'id-dayni wa ghalabatir-rijal.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, senden üzüntü ve kederden, acizlik ve tembellikten, korkaklık ve cimrilikten, borç yükünden ve insanların baskısından sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ احْفَظْنِي مِنْ بَيْنِ يَدَيَّ، وَمِنْ خَلْفِي، وَعَنْ يَمِينِي، وَعَنْ شِمَالِي، وَمِنْ فَوْقِي، وَأَعُوذُ بِعَظَمَتِكَ أَنْ أُغْتَالَ مِنْ تَحْتِي
englishTranslation: O Allah, protect me from my front, behind me, from my right, from my left, from above me, and I seek refuge in Your greatness from being taken unaware from beneath me.
germanTranslation: O Allah, beschütze mich von vorne, von hinten, von rechts, von links, von oben, und ich suche Zuflucht in Deiner Größe davor, von unten überrascht zu werden.
transliteration: Allahumma ihfazni min bayni yadayya, wa min khalfi, wa 'an yamini, wa 'an shimali, wa min fawqi, wa a'udhu bi 'azamatika an ughtala min tahti.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, önümden, arkamdan, sağımdan, solumdan ve üstümden gelecek kötülüklerden koru. Aşağıdan ansızın yakalanmaktan da senin azametine sığınırım.

arabicText: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ، وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
englishTranslation: There is no god but Allah alone, with no partner. To Him belongs the dominion and to Him belongs all praise, and He is over all things competent.
germanTranslation: Es gibt keinen Gott außer Allah allein, ohne Partner. Ihm gehört die Herrschaft und Ihm gebührt alles Lob, und Er hat Macht über alle Dinge.
transliteration: La ilaha illallahu wahdahu la sharika lahu, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu, wa huwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadir.
turkishTranslation: Allah'tan başka ilah yoktur, O tektir, ortağı yoktur. Mülk O'nundur, hamd O'na mahsustur ve O her şeye kadirdir.

arabicText: رَضِيتُ بِاللَّهِ رَبًّا، وَبِالْإِسْلَامِ دِينًا، وَبِمُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ نَبِيًّا
englishTranslation: I am pleased with Allah as my Lord, Islam as my religion, and Muhammad (peace be upon him) as my Prophet.
germanTranslation: Ich bin zufrieden mit Allah als meinem Herrn, mit dem Islam als meiner Religion und mit Muhammad (Friede sei auf ihm) als meinem Propheten.
transliteration: Raditu billahi Rabban, wa bil-Islami dinan, wa bi-Muhammadin (sallallahu 'alayhi wa sallam) nabiyya.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ı Rab, İslam'ı din, Muhammed'i (sallallahu aleyhi ve sellem) peygamber olarak kabul ettim.

arabicText: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ الْعَظِيمِ
englishTranslation: Glory be to Allah and praise Him, glory be to Allah the Almighty.
germanTranslation: Preis sei Allah und Lob sei Ihm, Preis sei Allah, dem Allmächtigen.
transliteration: Subhanallahi wa bihamdihi, subhanallahil-'azim.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ı tesbih ve hamd ederim, yüce Allah'ı tesbih ederim.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْبَرَصِ، وَالْجُنُونِ، وَالْجُذَامِ، وَمِنْ سَيِّئِ الْأَسْقَامِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from leprosy, madness, elephantiasis, and evil diseases.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Lepra, Wahnsinn, Elefantiasis und bösen Krankheiten.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-barasi, wal-jununi, wal-judhami, wa min sayyi'il-asqam.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, cüzzamdan, delilikten, cüzamdan ve kötü hastalıklardan sana sığınırım.

arabicText: أَعُوذُ بِوَجْهِ اللَّهِ الْكَرِيمِ وَبِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا يُنْزَلُ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ وَشَرِّ مَا يَعْرُجُ فِيهَا
englishTranslation: I seek refuge in the Noble Face of Allah and His perfect words from the evil of what descends from the sky and the evil of what ascends into it.
germanTranslation: Ich suche Zuflucht im edlen Angesicht Allahs und in Seinen vollkommenen Worten vor dem Bösen dessen, was vom Himmel herabkommt und dem Bösen dessen, was in ihn hinaufsteigt.
transliteration: A'udhu bi-wajhillahil-karimi wa bi-kalimatillahi at-tammati min sharri ma yunzalu minas-sama'i wa sharri ma ya'ruju fiha.
turkishTranslation: Gökten inenin ve göğe yükselenin şerrinden, Allah'ın Kerim yüzüne ve mükemmel kelimelerine sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ زَوَالِ نِعْمَتِكَ، وَتَحَوُّلِ عَافِيَتِكَ، وَفُجَاءَةِ نِقْمَتِكَ، وَجَمِيعِ سَخَطِكَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the removal of Your blessings, the change of Your protection, the suddenness of Your punishment, and all Your displeasure.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir davor, dass Deine Gaben schwinden, Dein Schutz sich ändert, Deine Strafe plötzlich kommt und vor all Deinem Zorn.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min zawali ni'matik, wa tahawwuli 'afiyatik, wa fuja'ati niqmatik, wa jami'i sakhatik.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, nimetlerinin gitmesinden, afiyetinin değişmesinden, cezanın ansızın gelmesinden ve bütün gazabından sana sığınırım.

arabicText: حَسْبُنَا اللَّهُ وَنِعْمَ الْوَكِيلُ
englishTranslation: Allah is sufficient for us, and He is the best Disposer of affairs.
germanTranslation: Allah genügt uns, und Er ist der beste Beschützer.
transliteration: Hasbunallahu wa ni'mal-wakil.
turkishTranslation: Allah bize yeter, O ne güzel vekildir.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ جَارِ السُّوءِ، وَمِنْ زَوْجٍ تُشَيِّبُنِي قَبْلَ الْمَشِيبِ، وَمِنْ وَلَدٍ يَكُونُ عَلَيَّ رَبًّا، وَمِنْ مَالٍ يَكُونُ عَلَيَّ عَذَابًا، وَمِنْ خَلِيلٍ مَاكِرٍ عَيْنُهُ تَرَانِي وَقَلْبُهُ يَرْعَانِي، إِنْ رَأَى حَسَنَةً دَفَنَهَا، وَإِذَا رَأَى سَيِّئَةً أَذَاعَهَا
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from an evil neighbor, from a spouse who causes me to age before old age, from a child who becomes my master, from wealth that becomes a punishment for me, and from a cunning friend whose eyes watch me and whose heart schemes against me—if he sees a good deed, he hides it, and if he sees an evil deed, he spreads it.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor einem schlechten Nachbarn, einem Ehepartner, der mich vor der Zeit altern lässt, einem Kind, das über mich herrscht, Reichtum, der mir zur Strafe wird, und einem hinterlistigen Freund, dessen Auge mich sieht und dessen Herz mir nachstellt—wenn er eine gute Tat sieht, verbirgt er sie, und wenn er eine schlechte sieht, verbreitet er sie.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min jaris-su'i, wa min zawjin tushayyibuni qablal-mashibi, wa min waladin yakunu 'alayya rabban, wa min malin yakunu 'alayya 'adhaban, wa min khalilin makirin 'aynuhu tarani wa qalbuhu yar'ani, in ra'a hasanatan dafanaha, wa idha ra'a sayyi'atan adha'aha.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, kötü komşudan, beni yaşlandıran eşten, bana efendi olacak çocuktan, bana azap olacak maldan, gözü beni gören ve kalbi bana tuzak kuran hain dosttan sana sığınırım. İyilik görürse gizler, kötülük görürse yayar.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْفَقْرِ، وَالْقِلَّةِ، وَالذِّلَّةِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ أَنْ أَظْلِمَ أَوْ أُظْلَمَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from poverty, scarcity, and humiliation, and I seek refuge in You from oppressing or being oppressed.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Armut, Mangel und Erniedrigung, und ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir davor, zu unterdrücken oder unterdrückt zu werden.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-faqri, wal-qillati, wadh-dhillati, wa a'udhu bika min an azlima aw uzlam.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, fakirlikten, azlıktan ve zilletten sana sığınırım. Zulmetmekten veya zulme uğramaktan da sana sığınırım.

arabicText: لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ
englishTranslation: There is no power nor strength except with Allah.
germanTranslation: Es gibt keine Macht und keine Kraft außer durch Allah.
transliteration: La hawla wa la quwwata illa billah.
turkishTranslation: Güç ve kuvvet ancak Allah'ın yardımıyladır.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْكُفْرِ وَالْفَقْرِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from disbelief and poverty.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Unglauben und Armut.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-kufri wal-faqri.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, küfürden ve fakirlikten sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْهُدَى وَالتُّقَى وَالْعَفَافَ وَالْغِنَى
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for guidance, piety, chastity, and self-sufficiency.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Rechtleitung, Gottesfurcht, Keuschheit und Unabhängigkeit.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'alukal-huda wat-tuqa wal-'afafa wal-ghina.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, senden hidayet, takva, iffet ve zenginlik diliyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي بَدَنِي، اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي سَمْعِي، اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي بَصَرِي، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, grant me health in my body. O Allah, grant me health in my hearing. O Allah, grant me health in my sight. There is no god but You.
germanTranslation: O Allah, gewähre mir Gesundheit in meinem Körper. O Allah, gewähre mir Gesundheit in meinem Gehör. O Allah, gewähre mir Gesundheit in meinem Sehen. Es gibt keinen Gott außer Dir.
transliteration: Allahumma 'afini fi badani, Allahumma 'afini fi sam'i, Allahumma 'afini fi basari, la ilaha illa anta.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, bedenime sağlık ver. Allah'ım, kulağıma sağlık ver. Allah'ım, gözüme sağlık ver. Senden başka ilah yoktur.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ البَرَصِ، وَالجُنُونِ، وَالجُذَامِ، وَمِنْ سَيِّئِ الأَسْقَامِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from leprosy, madness, elephantiasis, and evil diseases.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Lepra, Wahnsinn, Elefantiasis und bösen Krankheiten.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-barasi, wal-jununi, wal-judhami, wa min sayyi'il-asqam.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, cüzzamdan, delilikten, fil hastalığından ve kötü hastalıklardan sana sığınırım.

arabicText: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ فِي الأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ العَلِيمُ
englishTranslation: In the name of Allah, with Whose name nothing on earth or in the sky can cause harm, and He is the All-Hearing, All-Knowing.
germanTranslation: Im Namen Allahs, mit Dessen Namen nichts auf der Erde oder im Himmel Schaden zufügen kann, und Er ist der Allhörende, der Allwissende.
transliteration: Bismillah alladhi la yadurru ma'asmihi shay'un fil-ardi wa la fis-sama'i wa huwas-Sami'ul-Alim.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ın adıyla ki, O'nun adı anıldığında yerde ve gökte hiçbir şey zarar veremez. O, işitendir, bilendir.

arabicText: أَسْأَلُ اللَّهَ العَظِيمَ رَبَّ العَرْشِ العَظِيمِ أَنْ يَشْفِيَكَ
englishTranslation: I ask Almighty Allah, Lord of the Magnificent Throne, to cure you.
germanTranslation: Ich bitte den erhabenen Allah, den Herrn des gewaltigen Thrones, dich zu heilen.
transliteration: As'alullah al-'Azima Rabbal-'Arshil-'Azim an yashfiyak.
turkishTranslation: Yüce Arş'ın Rabbi olan Allah'tan sana şifa vermesini diliyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اشْفِهِ، اللَّهُمَّ اشْفِهِ، اللَّهُمَّ اشْفِهِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, cure him. O Allah, cure him. O Allah, cure him.
germanTranslation: O Allah, heile ihn. O Allah, heile ihn. O Allah, heile ihn.
transliteration: Allahumma ashfih, Allahumma ashfih, Allahumma ashfih.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, ona şifa ver. Allah'ım, ona şifa ver. Allah'ım, ona şifa ver.

arabicText: حَسْبِيَ اللَّهُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَهُوَ رَبُّ العَرْشِ العَظِيمِ
englishTranslation: Allah is sufficient for me. There is no god but Him. In Him I place my trust, and He is the Lord of the Great Throne.
germanTranslation: Allah genügt mir. Es gibt keinen Gott außer Ihm. Auf Ihn verlasse ich mich, und Er ist der Herr des gewaltigen Thrones.
transliteration: Hasbiyallahu la ilaha illa huwa, 'alayhi tawakkaltu wa huwa Rabbul-'Arshil-'Azim.
turkishTranslation: Allah bana yeter. O'ndan başka ilah yoktur. Ben O'na güvendim ve O, büyük Arş'ın Rabbidir.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ العَجْزِ وَالكَسَلِ، وَالجُبْنِ وَالهَرَمِ، وَالبُخْلِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ القَبْرِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ فِتْنَةِ المَحْيَا وَالمَمَاتِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from helplessness, laziness, cowardice, old age, and miserliness. I seek refuge in You from the torment of the grave and the trials of life and death.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Hilflosigkeit, Faulheit, Feigheit, Altersschwäche und Geiz. Ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor der Qual des Grabes und den Prüfungen des Lebens und des Todes.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-'ajzi wal-kasali, wal-jubni wal-harami, wal-bukhli, wa a'udhu bika min 'adhabil-qabri, wa a'udhu bika min fitnatil-mahya wal-mamat.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, acizlikten, tembellikten, korkaklıktan, yaşlılıktan ve cimrilikten sana sığınırım. Kabir azabından, hayat ve ölüm fitnesinden sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ العَفْوَ وَالعَافِيَةَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالآخِرَةِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in this life and the Hereafter.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Vergebung und Wohlergehen im Diesseits und im Jenseits.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'alukal-'afwa wal-'afiyah fid-dunya wal-akhirah.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, senden dünya ve ahirette afiyet ve bağışlanma diliyorum.

arabicText: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
englishTranslation: Our Lord, grant us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.
germanTranslation: Unser Herr, gib uns im Diesseits Gutes und im Jenseits Gutes und bewahre uns vor der Strafe des Feuers.
transliteration: Rabbana atina fid-dunya hasanatan wa fil-akhirati hasanatan wa qina 'adhaban-nar.
turkishTranslation: Rabbimiz, bize dünyada iyilik ver, ahirette de iyilik ver ve bizi cehennem azabından koru.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ العَافِيَةَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالآخِرَةِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for well-being in this life and the Hereafter.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Wohlergehen im Diesseits und im Jenseits.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'alukal-'afiyah fid-dunya wal-akhirah.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, senden dünya ve ahirette afiyet diliyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الهَدَمِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ التَّرَدِّي، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الغَرَقِ، وَالحَرَقِ، وَالهَرَمِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ أَنْ يَتَخَبَّطَنِي الشَّيْطَانُ عِنْدَ المَوْتِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from being crushed, falling, drowning, burning, and old age. I seek refuge in You from being misled by Satan at the time of death.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Zerstörung, Stürzen, Ertrinken, Verbrennen und Altersschwäche. Ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir davor, dass Satan mich beim Tod in die Irre führt.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-hadami, wa a'udhu bika minat-taraddi, wa a'udhu bika minal-gharaqi, wal-haraqi, wal-harami, wa a'udhu bika an yatakhabbatani ash-shaytanu 'indal-mawt.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, ezilmekten, düşmekten, boğulmaktan, yanmaktan ve yaşlılıktan sana sığınırım. Ölüm anında şeytanın beni saptırmasından sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الجُوعِ فَإِنَّهُ بِئْسَ الضَّجِيعُ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الخِيَانَةِ فَإِنَّهَا بِئْسَتِ البِطَانَةُ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from hunger, for it is a bad companion, and I seek refuge in You from betrayal, for it is a bad inner trait.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Hunger, denn er ist ein schlechter Gefährte, und ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Verrat, denn er ist eine schlechte Eigenschaft.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-ju'i fa innahu bi'sad-daji'u, wa a'udhu bika minal-khiyanati fa innaha bi'satul-bitana.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, açlıktan sana sığınırım, çünkü o ne kötü bir arkadaştır. Hainlikten de sana sığınırım, çünkü o ne kötü bir huydur.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ العِلَلِ وَالأَسْقَامِ وَالأَوْجَاعِ وَالأَحْزَانِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from ailments, diseases, pains, and sorrows.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Gebrechen, Krankheiten, Schmerzen und Kummer.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-'ilali wal-asqami wal-awja'i wal-ahzani.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, hastalıklardan, dertlerden, ağrılardan ve üzüntülerden sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الفَقْرِ، وَالقِلَّةِ، وَالذِّلَّةِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ أَنْ أَظْلِمَ أَوْ أُظْلَمَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from poverty, scarcity, and humiliation. I seek refuge in You from oppressing or being oppressed.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Armut, Mangel und Erniedrigung. Ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir davor, zu unterdrücken oder unterdrückt zu werden.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-faqri, wal-qillati, wadh-dhillati, wa a'udhu bika min an azlima aw uzlam.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, fakirlikten, azlıktan ve zilletten sana sığınırım. Zulmetmekten veya zulme uğramaktan sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ أَصْلِحْ لِي دِينِيَ الَّذِي هُوَ عِصْمَةُ أَمْرِي، وَأَصْلِحْ لِي دُنْيَايَ الَّتِي فِيهَا مَعَاشِي، وَأَصْلِحْ لِي آخِرَتِي الَّتِي فِيهَا مَعَادِي، وَاجْعَلِ الحَيَاةَ زِيَادَةً لِي فِي كُلِّ خَيْرٍ، وَاجْعَلِ المَوْتَ رَاحَةً لِي مِنْ كُلِّ شَرٍّ
englishTranslation: O Allah, rectify my religion, which is the safeguard of my affairs. Rectify my worldly life, where I earn my living. Rectify my Hereafter, where I will return. Make life a means for me to increase in every good, and make death a relief for me from every evil.
germanTranslation: O Allah, korrigiere meine Religion, die der Schutz meiner Angelegenheiten ist. Korrigiere mein diesseitiges Leben, in dem ich meinen Lebensunterhalt verdiene. Korrigiere mein Jenseits, wohin ich zurückkehren werde. Mache das Leben für mich zu einem Mittel, in allem Guten zuzunehmen, und mache den Tod für mich zu einer Erleichterung von allem Übel.
transliteration: Allahumma aslih li diniyalladhi huwa 'ismatu amri, wa aslih li dunyaya allati fiha ma'ashi, wa aslih li akhirati allati fiha ma'adi, waj'alil-hayata ziyadatan li fi kulli khayrin, waj'alil-mawta rahatan li min kulli sharrin.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, işlerimin koruyucusu olan dinimi düzelt. Geçimimi sağladığım dünyamı düzelt. Dönüş yerim olan ahiretimi düzelt. Hayatı her iyilikte artış vesilesi kıl, ölümü de her kötülükten kurtuluş vesilesi kıl.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ زَوَالِ نِعْمَتِكَ، وَتَحَوُّلِ عَافِيَتِكَ، وَفُجَاءَةِ نِقْمَتِكَ، وَجَمِيعِ سَخَطِكَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the removal of Your blessings, the loss of Your protection, the suddenness of Your punishment, and all forms of Your displeasure.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor dem Entzug Deiner Gaben, dem Verlust Deines Schutzes, dem plötzlichen Eintreten Deiner Strafe und allem, was Deinen Zorn erregt.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min zawali ni'matik, wa tahawwuli 'afiyatik, wa fuja'ati niqmatik, wa jami'i sakhatik.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, nimetlerinin yok olmasından, afiyetinin değişmesinden, cezanın aniden gelmesinden ve bütün gazabından sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ خَيْرِ مَا سَأَلَكَ مِنْهُ نَبِيُّكَ مُحَمَّدٌ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا اسْتَعَاذَ مِنْهُ نَبِيُّكَ مُحَمَّدٌ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for the good that Your Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him) asked You for, and I seek refuge in You from the evil from which Your Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him) sought refuge.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um das Gute, das Dein Prophet Muhammad (Friede sei mit ihm) von Dir erbeten hat, und ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor dem Übel, vor dem Dein Prophet Muhammad (Friede sei mit ihm) Zuflucht gesucht hat.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka min khayri ma sa'alaka minhu nabiyyuka Muhammadun sallallahu 'alayhi wa sallam, wa a'udhu bika min sharri mast'a'adh minhu nabiyyuka Muhammadun sallallahu 'alayhi wa sallam.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, Peygamberin Muhammed'in (sallallahu aleyhi ve sellem) senden istediği hayrı ben de senden istiyorum. Peygamberin Muhammed'in (sallallahu aleyhi ve sellem) sığındığı şerlerden ben de sana sığınıyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ العَجْزِ وَالكَسَلِ، وَالجُبْنِ وَالبُخْلِ، وَضَلَعِ الدَّيْنِ، وَغَلَبَةِ الرِّجَالِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from helplessness, laziness, cowardice, miserliness, overwhelming debt, and the domination of men.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Hilflosigkeit, Faulheit, Feigheit, Geiz, erdrückenden Schulden und der Unterdrückung durch Menschen.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-'ajzi wal-kasali, wal-jubni wal-bukhli, wa dala'id-dayni, wa ghalabatir-rijal.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, acizlikten, tembellikten, korkaklıktan, cimrilikten, borç yükünden ve insanların tahakkümünden sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الهَمِّ وَالحَزَنِ، وَالعَجْزِ وَالكَسَلِ، وَالجُبْنِ وَالبُخْلِ، وَضَلَعِ الدَّيْنِ، وَغَلَبَةِ الرِّجَالِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from grief and sadness, from helplessness and laziness, from cowardice and miserliness, from overwhelming debt, and from the domination of men.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Kummer und Traurigkeit, vor Hilflosigkeit und Faulheit, vor Feigheit und Geiz, vor erdrückenden Schulden und der Unterdrückung durch Menschen.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazan, wal-'ajzi wal-kasali, wal-jubni wal-bukhli, wa dala'id-dayni, wa ghalabatir-rijal.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, üzüntü ve kederden, acizlik ve tembellikten, korkaklık ve cimrilikten, borç yükünden ve insanların tahakkümünden sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اشْفِ مَرْضَانَا وَمَرْضَى المُسْلِمِينَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, cure our sick and the sick among the Muslims.
germanTranslation: O Allah, heile unsere Kranken und die Kranken unter den Muslimen.
transliteration: Allahumma ashfi maradana wa maradal-muslimin.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, hastalarımıza ve Müslümanların hastalarına şifa ver.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الصِّحَّةَ وَالعَافِيَةَ، وَحُسْنَ الخُلُقِ، وَالرِّضَا بِالقَضَاءِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for health, well-being, good character, and contentment with divine decree.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Gesundheit, Wohlergehen, guten Charakter und Zufriedenheit mit dem göttlichen Beschluss.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'alukas-sihhata wal-'afiyah, wa husnal-khuluqi, war-rida bil-qada'i.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, senden sağlık, afiyet, güzel ahlak ve kaderine rıza diliyorum.

arabicText: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً وَهَيِّئْ لَنَا مِنْ أَمْرِنَا رَشَدًا
englishTranslation: Our Lord, grant us from Yourself mercy and prepare for us from our affair right guidance.
germanTranslation: Unser Herr, gewähre uns von Dir Barmherzigkeit und bereite uns in unserer Angelegenheit rechtes Leiten.
transliteration: Rabbana atina min ladunka rahmatan wa hayyi' lana min amrina rashada
turkishTranslation: Rabbimiz, bize katından bir rahmet ver ve bize işimizde bir doğruluk hazırla.

arabicText: رَبِّ اشْرَحْ لِي صَدْرِي وَيَسِّرْ لِي أَمْرِي
englishTranslation: My Lord, expand for me my breast and ease for me my task.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, weite mir meine Brust und erleichtere mir meine Aufgabe.
transliteration: Rabbi ishrah li sadri wa yassir li amri
turkishTranslation: Rabbim, göğsümü genişlet, işimi kolaylaştır.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اهْدِنِي وَسَدِّدْنِي
englishTranslation: O Allah, guide me and make me steadfast.
germanTranslation: O Allah, führe mich recht und mache mich standhaft.
transliteration: Allahumma ihdini wa saddidni
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, bana hidayet ver ve beni dosdoğru yola ilet.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْهُدَى وَالتُّقَى وَالْعَفَافَ وَالْغِنَى
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for guidance, piety, chastity, and self-sufficiency.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Rechtleitung, Gottesfurcht, Keuschheit und Unabhängigkeit.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka al-huda wa at-tuqa wa al-afafa wa al-ghina
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, senden hidayet, takva, iffet ve zenginlik diliyorum.

arabicText: يَا مُقَلِّبَ الْقُلُوبِ ثَبِّتْ قَلْبِي عَلَى دِينِكَ
englishTranslation: O Turner of the hearts, make my heart firm upon Your religion.
germanTranslation: O Wendender der Herzen, festige mein Herz auf Deiner Religion.
transliteration: Ya muqalliba al-qulub thabbit qalbi ala deenik
turkishTranslation: Ey kalpleri evirip çeviren Allah'ım, kalbimi dinin üzere sabit kıl.

arabicText: رَبِّ زِدْنِي عِلْمًا
englishTranslation: My Lord, increase me in knowledge.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, vermehre mein Wissen.
transliteration: Rabbi zidni ilma
turkishTranslation: Rabbim, benim ilmimi artır.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ أَرِنَا الْحَقَّ حَقًّا وَارْزُقْنَا اتِّبَاعَهُ، وَأَرِنَا الْبَاطِلَ بَاطِلًا وَارْزُقْنَا اجْتِنَابَهُ
englishTranslation: O Allah, show us the truth as truth and grant us the ability to follow it, and show us falsehood as falsehood and grant us the ability to avoid it.
germanTranslation: O Allah, zeige uns die Wahrheit als Wahrheit und gewähre uns, ihr zu folgen, und zeige uns das Falsche als falsch und gewähre uns, es zu meiden.
transliteration: Allahumma arina al-haqqa haqqan warzuqna ittiba'ahu, wa arina al-batila batilan warzuqna ijtinabahu
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, bize hakkı hak olarak göster ve ona uymayı nasip et, batılı da batıl olarak göster ve ondan uzak durmayı nasip et.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ زَوَالِ نِعْمَتِكَ، وَتَحَوُّلِ عَافِيَتِكَ، وَفُجَاءَةِ نِقْمَتِكَ، وَجَمِيعِ سَخَطِكَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the removal of Your blessings, the change in Your protection, the suddenness of Your punishment, and all forms of Your displeasure.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor dem Entzug Deiner Gaben, der Veränderung Deiner Gesundheit, dem plötzlichen Eintreffen Deiner Strafe und allem, was Deinen Zorn erregt.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min zawali ni'matik, wa tahawwuli 'afiyatik, wa fuja'ati niqmatik, wa jami'i sakhatik
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, nimetlerinin yok olmasından, afiyetinin değişmesinden, cezanın ansızın gelmesinden ve bütün gazabından sana sığınırım.

arabicText: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا وَهَبْ لَنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ الْوَهَّابُ
englishTranslation: Our Lord, do not let our hearts deviate after You have guided us. Grant us Your mercy. Indeed, You are the Bestower.
germanTranslation: Unser Herr, lass unsere Herzen nicht abschweifen, nachdem Du uns rechtgeleitet hast. Gewähre uns Deine Barmherzigkeit. Wahrlich, Du bist der Gabenverleiher.
transliteration: Rabbana la tuzigh qulubana ba'da idh hadaytana wa hab lana min ladunka rahmah, innaka antal-Wahhab
turkishTranslation: Rabbimiz, bize hidayet verdikten sonra kalplerimizi saptırma. Katından bize rahmet bağışla. Şüphesiz Sen, bol bol verensin.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ عِلْمًا نَافِعًا، وَرِزْقًا طَيِّبًا، وَعَمَلًا مُتَقَبَّلًا
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, lawful provision, and accepted deeds.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um nützliches Wissen, guten Lebensunterhalt und angenommene Taten.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka ilman nafi'an, wa rizqan tayyiban, wa amalan mutaqabbalan
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, senden faydalı ilim, helal rızık ve kabul edilen amel istiyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْنِي مِنَ الَّذِينَ إِذَا أَحْسَنُوا اسْتَبْشَرُوا، وَإِذَا أَسَاءُوا اسْتَغْفَرُوا
englishTranslation: O Allah, make me among those who, when they do good, rejoice, and when they do wrong, seek forgiveness.
germanTranslation: O Allah, mache mich zu denen, die, wenn sie Gutes tun, sich freuen, und wenn sie Fehler machen, um Vergebung bitten.
transliteration: Allahummaj'alni min alladhina idha ahsanu istabsharu, wa idha asa'u istaghfaru
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, beni iyilik yaptıklarında sevinen, kötülük yaptıklarında istiğfar edenlerden eyle.

arabicText: رَبِّ اجْعَلْنِي مُقِيمَ الصَّلَاةِ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِي ۚ رَبَّنَا وَتَقَبَّلْ دُعَاءِ
englishTranslation: My Lord, make me and my descendants establishers of prayer. Our Lord, accept my supplication.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, mache mich und meine Nachkommen zu denen, die das Gebet verrichten. Unser Herr, nimm mein Bittgebet an.
transliteration: Rabbi ij'alni muqeema as-salati wa min dhurriyyati, Rabbana wa taqabbal du'a
turkishTranslation: Rabbim, beni ve soyumdan gelenleri namazı dosdoğru kılanlardan eyle. Rabbimiz, duamı kabul et.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ أَصْلِحْ لِي دِينِيَ الَّذِي هُوَ عِصْمَةُ أَمْرِي، وَأَصْلِحْ لِي دُنْيَايَ الَّتِي فِيهَا مَعَاشِي، وَأَصْلِحْ لِي آخِرَتِيَ الَّتِي فِيهَا مَعَادِي، وَاجْعَلِ الْحَيَاةَ زِيَادَةً لِي فِي كُلِّ خَيْرٍ، وَاجْعَلِ الْمَوْتَ رَاحَةً لِي مِن كُلِّ شَرٍّ
englishTranslation: O Allah, rectify for me my religion, which is the safeguard of my affairs. Rectify for me my worldly life, in which is my livelihood. Rectify for me my Hereafter, in which is my return. Make life an increase for me in every good, and make death a relief for me from every evil.
germanTranslation: O Allah, korrigiere für mich meine Religion, die der Schutz meiner Angelegenheiten ist. Korrigiere für mich mein diesseitiges Leben, in dem mein Lebensunterhalt liegt. Korrigiere für mich mein Jenseits, in das ich zurückkehre. Mache das Leben für mich zu einer Zunahme an allem Guten und mache den Tod für mich zu einer Erleichterung von allem Übel.
transliteration: Allahumma aslih li diniya alladhi huwa ismatu amri, wa aslih li dunyaya allati fiha ma'ashi, wa aslih li akhiratiya allati fiha ma'adi, waj'al al-hayata ziyadatan li fi kulli khayr, waj'al al-mawta rahatan li min kulli sharr
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, işlerimin koruyucusu olan dinimi benim için ıslah et. Geçim kaynağım olan dünyamı benim için ıslah et. Dönüş yerim olan ahiretimi benim için ıslah et. Hayatı her hayırda artış, ölümü de her şerden kurtuluş eyle.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ فِعْلَ الْخَيْرَاتِ، وَتَرْكَ الْمُنْكَرَاتِ، وَحُبَّ الْمَسَاكِينِ، وَأَنْ تَغْفِرَ لِي وَتَرْحَمَنِي
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for the ability to do good deeds, abandon evil deeds, love the poor, and that You forgive me and have mercy on me.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um die Fähigkeit, gute Taten zu vollbringen, schlechte Taten zu unterlassen, die Armen zu lieben, und dass Du mir vergibst und Dich meiner erbarmst.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka fi'lal khayrat, wa tarkal munkarat, wa hubbal masakin, wa an taghfira li wa tarhamani
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, senden hayırlı işler yapmayı, kötülükleri terk etmeyi, fakirleri sevmeyi, beni bağışlamanı ve bana merhamet etmeni istiyorum.

arabicText: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي حُكْمًا وَأَلْحِقْنِي بِالصَّالِحِينَ
englishTranslation: My Lord, grant me wisdom and join me with the righteous.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, gewähre mir Weisheit und füge mich den Rechtschaffenen bei.
transliteration: Rabbi hab li hukman wa alhiqni bis-salihin
turkishTranslation: Rabbim, bana hikmet ver ve beni salihlerle beraber eyle.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اهْدِنِي فِيمَنْ هَدَيْتَ، وَعَافِنِي فِيمَنْ عَافَيْتَ، وَتَوَلَّنِي فِيمَنْ تَوَلَّيْتَ، وَبَارِكْ لِي فِيمَا أَعْطَيْتَ، وَقِنِي شَرَّ مَا قَضَيْتَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, guide me among those You have guided, pardon me among those You have pardoned, turn to me in friendship among those You have turned in friendship, bless me in what You have given me, and protect me from the evil of what You have decreed.
germanTranslation: O Allah, leite mich unter denen, die Du rechtgeleitet hast, vergib mir unter denen, denen Du vergeben hast, wende Dich mir freundlich zu unter denen, denen Du Dich freundlich zugewandt hast, segne mich in dem, was Du mir gegeben hast, und beschütze mich vor dem Übel dessen, was Du bestimmt hast.
transliteration: Allahumma ihdini fi man hadayta, wa 'afini fi man 'afayta, wa tawallani fi man tawallayta, wa barik li fi ma a'tayta, wa qini sharra ma qadayta
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, hidayet verdiklerinle bana hidayet ver, afiyet verdiklerinle bana afiyet ver, dost olduklarınla bana dost ol, verdiğin şeylerde bana bereket ver ve takdir ettiğin şerlerden beni koru.

arabicText: رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَاجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ وَاجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
englishTranslation: Our Lord, grant us from among our wives and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us an example for the righteous.
germanTranslation: Unser Herr, gewähre uns von unseren Gattinnen und Nachkommen Augentrost und mache uns zu einem Vorbild für die Gottesfürchtigen.
transliteration: Rabbana hab lana min azwajina wa dhurriyatina qurrata a'yunin waj'alna lil-muttaqina imama
turkishTranslation: Rabbimiz, eşlerimizden ve çocuklarımızdan bize göz aydınlığı ver ve bizi takva sahiplerine önder eyle.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ، وَالْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ، وَالْبُخْلِ وَالْجُبْنِ، وَضَلَعِ الدَّيْنِ وَغَلَبَةِ الرِّجَالِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from grief and sadness, from weakness and laziness, from miserliness and cowardice, from being overcome by debt and overpowered by men.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Kummer und Trauer, Schwäche und Faulheit, Geiz und Feigheit, Schuldenlast und der Unterdrückung durch Menschen.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min al-hammi wal-hazan, wal-'ajzi wal-kasal, wal-bukhli wal-jubn, wa dala'id-dayn wa ghalabatir-rijal
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, kederden, üzüntüden, acizlikten, tembellikten, cimrilikten, korkaklıktan, borç yükünden ve insanların baskısından sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الثَّبَاتَ فِي الْأَمْرِ، وَالْعَزِيمَةَ عَلَى الرُّشْدِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for steadfastness in affairs and determination in guidance.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Standhaftigkeit in den Angelegenheiten und Entschlossenheit auf dem rechten Weg.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka ath-thabata fil-amr, wal-azimata ala rushd
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, senden işlerde sebat ve doğru yolda azim istiyorum.

arabicText: رَبِّ أَدْخِلْنِي مُدْخَلَ صِدْقٍ وَأَخْرِجْنِي مُخْرَجَ صِدْقٍ وَاجْعَلْ لِي مِنْ لَدُنْكَ سُلْطَانًا نَصِيرًا
englishTranslation: My Lord, cause me to enter a truthful entrance and cause me to exit a truthful exit, and grant me from Yourself a supporting authority.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, lasse mich in Wahrheit eintreten und in Wahrheit austreten, und gewähre mir von Dir eine unterstützende Macht.
transliteration: Rabbi adkhilni mudkhala sidqin wa akhrijni mukhraja sidqin waj'al li min ladunka sultanan nasira
turkishTranslation: Rabbim, beni doğru bir girişle girdir ve doğru bir çıkışla çıkar. Katından bana yardımcı bir kuvvet ver.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ أَعِنِّي عَلَى ذِكْرِكَ، وَشُكْرِكَ، وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِكَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, help me remember You, express gratitude to You, and worship You in the best manner.
germanTranslation: O Allah, hilf mir, Dich zu gedenken, Dir Dank zu sagen und Dir auf beste Weise zu dienen.
transliteration: Allahumma a’inni ‘ala dhikrika, wa shukrika, wa husni ‘ibadatika
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, seni anmamda, sana şükretmemde ve sana en güzel şekilde ibadet etmemde bana yardım et.

arabicText: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي بِنِعْمَتِهِ تَتِمُّ الصَّالِحَاتُ
englishTranslation: All praise is due to Allah, by whose favor good deeds are completed.
germanTranslation: Alles Lob gebührt Allah, durch dessen Gunst die guten Taten vollendet werden.
transliteration: Alhamdulillahi alladhi bi ni’matihi tatimmus-salihat
turkishTranslation: Nimetleriyle iyilikler tamamlanan Allah'a hamd olsun.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْنِي مِنَ الشَّاكِرِينَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, make me among the grateful.
germanTranslation: O Allah, mache mich zu den Dankbaren.
transliteration: Allahummaj’alni minash-shakirin
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, beni şükredenlerden eyle.

arabicText: رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِي أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ الَّتِي أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَى وَالِدَيَّ وَأَنْ أَعْمَلَ صَالِحًا تَرْضَاهُ
englishTranslation: My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to do righteousness of which You approve.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, gib mir ein, für Deine Gunst dankbar zu sein, die Du mir und meinen Eltern erwiesen hast, und rechtschaffene Werke zu tun, mit denen Du zufrieden bist.
transliteration: Rabbi awzi’ni an ashkura ni’mataka allati an’amta ‘alayya wa ‘ala walidayya wa an a’mala salihan tardahu
turkishTranslation: Rabbim, bana ve anne babama verdiğin nimetine şükretmemi ve senin razı olacağın salih ameller işlememi nasip et.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ مَا أَصْبَحَ بِي مِنْ نِعْمَةٍ أَوْ بِأَحَدٍ مِنْ خَلْقِكَ فَمِنْكَ وَحْدَكَ لَا شَرِيكَ لَكَ، فَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ وَلَكَ الشُّكْرُ
englishTranslation: O Allah, whatever blessing I or any of Your creation have received in the morning is from You alone, with no partner. To You alone is all praise and gratitude.
germanTranslation: O Allah, was für eine Gunst mir oder irgendeinem Deiner Geschöpfe am Morgen zuteilwird, kommt von Dir allein, Du hast keinen Partner. Dir allein gebührt Lob und Dank.
transliteration: Allahumma ma asbaha bi min ni’matin aw bi ahadin min khalqika fa minka wahdaka la sharika laka, falakal-hamdu wa lakash-shukr
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, sabah bana veya senin yarattıklarından herhangi birine ulaşan her nimet yalnızca sendendir, senin ortağın yoktur. Hamd ve şükür sana mahsustur.

arabicText: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ حَمْدًا كَثِيرًا طَيِّبًا مُبَارَكًا فِيهِ
englishTranslation: All praise is due to Allah, abundant, pure, and blessed praise.
germanTranslation: Alles Lob gebührt Allah, reichlich, rein und gesegnet.
transliteration: Alhamdulillahi hamdan kathiran tayyiban mubarakan fih
turkishTranslation: Çokça, temiz ve bereketli bir hamd Allah'a mahsustur.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْهُدَى وَالتُّقَى وَالْعَفَافَ وَالْغِنَى
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for guidance, piety, chastity, and self-sufficiency.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Rechtleitung, Gottesfurcht, Keuschheit und Unabhängigkeit.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as’alukal-huda wat-tuqa wal-‘afafa wal-ghina
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, senden hidayet, takva, iffet ve zenginlik diliyorum.

arabicText: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ وَلَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَاللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ
englishTranslation: Glory be to Allah, all praise is due to Allah, there is no god but Allah, and Allah is the Greatest.
germanTranslation: Preis sei Allah, alles Lob gebührt Allah, es gibt keinen Gott außer Allah, und Allah ist der Größte.
transliteration: Subhanallahi walhamdulillahi wa la ilaha illallahu wallahu akbar
turkishTranslation: Allah'ı tesbih ederim, hamd Allah'a mahsustur, Allah'tan başka ilah yoktur ve Allah en büyüktür.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ زَوَالِ نِعْمَتِكَ وَتَحَوُّلِ عَافِيَتِكَ وَفُجَاءَةِ نِقْمَتِكَ وَجَمِيعِ سَخَطِكَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the removal of Your blessings, the change in Your protection, the suddenness of Your punishment, and all forms of Your displeasure.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir davor, dass Deine Gaben schwinden, Dein Schutz sich ändert, Deine Strafe plötzlich kommt und vor allem, was Deinen Zorn erregt.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a’udhu bika min zawali ni’matika wa tahawwuli ‘afiyatika wa fuja’ati niqmatika wa jami’i sakhatika
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, nimetlerinin yok olmasından, afiyetinin değişmesinden, cezanın ansızın gelmesinden ve bütün gazabından sana sığınırım.

arabicText: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ العَالَمِينَ
englishTranslation: All praise is due to Allah, the Lord of the worlds.
germanTranslation: Alles Lob gebührt Allah, dem Herrn der Welten.
transliteration: Alhamdulillahi rabbil ‘alamin
turkishTranslation: Hamd, alemlerin Rabbi olan Allah'a mahsustur.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مُوجِبَاتِ رَحْمَتِكَ وَعَزَائِمَ مَغْفِرَتِكَ وَالسَّلامَةَ مِنْ كُلِّ إِثْمٍ وَالغَنِيمَةَ مِنْ كُلِّ بِرٍّ وَالفَوْزَ بِالجَنَّةِ وَالنَّجَاةَ مِنَ النَّارِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for the causes of Your mercy, the certainty of Your forgiveness, safety from every sin, the benefit of every good deed, success in attaining Paradise, and salvation from the Fire.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um die Gründe Deiner Barmherzigkeit, die Gewissheit Deiner Vergebung, Sicherheit vor jeder Sünde, den Nutzen jeder guten Tat, den Erfolg, das Paradies zu erlangen, und die Rettung vor dem Feuer.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as’aluka mawjibati rahmatika wa ‘aza’ima maghfiratika was-salamata min kulli ithmin wal-ghanimata min kulli birrin wal-fawza bil-jannati wan-najata minan-nar
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, senden rahmetinin sebeplerini, bağışlamanın kesinliğini, her günahtan korunmayı, her iyiliğin faydasını, cenneti kazanmayı ve ateşten kurtulmayı diliyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ فِعْلَ الخَيْرَاتِ وَتَرْكَ المُنْكَرَاتِ وَحُبَّ المَسَاكِينِ وَأَنْ تَغْفِرَ لِي وَتَرْحَمَنِي
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You to enable me to do good deeds, abandon evil deeds, love the poor, and that You forgive me and have mercy on me.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich darum, gute Taten zu vollbringen, Schlechtes zu unterlassen, die Armen zu lieben und dass Du mir vergibst und Dich meiner erbarmst.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as’aluka fi’lal-khayrati wa tarkal-munkarati wa hubbal-masakin wa an taghfira li wa tarhamani
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, senden hayırlı işler yapmayı, kötülükleri terk etmeyi, fakirleri sevmeyi, beni bağışlamanı ve bana merhamet etmeni diliyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الهَمِّ وَالحَزَنِ وَالعَجْزِ وَالكَسَلِ وَالبُخْلِ وَالجُبْنِ وَضَلَعِ الدَّيْنِ وَغَلَبَةِ الرِّجَالِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from anxiety, grief, weakness, laziness, miserliness, cowardice, the burden of debt, and the domination of men.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Kummer, Trauer, Schwäche, Faulheit, Geiz, Feigheit, Schuldenlast und der Unterdrückung durch andere.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a’udhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazani wal-‘ajzi wal-kasali wal-bukhli wal-jubni wa dala’id-dayni wa ghalabatir-rijal
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, senden endişeden, üzüntüden, acizlikten, tembellikten, cimrilikten, korkaklıktan, borç yükünden ve insanların baskısından sana sığınırım.

arabicText: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
englishTranslation: Our Lord, grant us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.
germanTranslation: Unser Herr, gib uns im Diesseits Gutes und im Jenseits Gutes und bewahre uns vor der Strafe des Feuers.
transliteration: Rabbana atina fid-dunya hasanatan wa fil-akhirati hasanatan wa qina ‘adhaban-nar
turkishTranslation: Rabbimiz, bize dünyada ve ahirette iyilik ver ve bizi ateşin azabından koru.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ العَافِيَةَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالآخِرَةِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for well-being in this world and the Hereafter.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Wohlergehen im Diesseits und im Jenseits.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as’alukal-‘afiyata fid-dunya wal-akhirah
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, senden dünya ve ahirette afiyet diliyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ مَا قَصُرَ عَنْهُ رَأْيِي وَضَعُفَ عَنْهُ عَمَلِي وَلَمْ تَنْتَهِ إِلَيْهِ رَغْبَتِي وَلَمْ تَبْلُغْهُ مَسْأَلَتِي مِنْ خَيْرٍ وَعَدْتَهُ أَحَدًا مِنْ خَلْقِكَ أَوْ خَيْرٍ أَنْتَ مُعْطِيهِ أَحَدًا مِنْ عِبَادِكَ فَإِنِّي أَرْغَبُ إِلَيْكَ فِيهِ وَأَسْأَلُكَهُ يَا رَبَّ العَالَمِينَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, whatever good my opinion falls short of, my actions are too weak for, my desire does not reach, and my request does not attain—whether it is good You have promised to any of Your creation or good You give to any of Your servants—then I eagerly seek it from You and ask You for it, O Lord of the worlds.
germanTranslation: O Allah, was für Gutes mein Verstand nicht erfassen kann, meine Taten nicht erreichen, mein Verlangen nicht anstrebt und meine Bitte nicht umfasst—ob es Gutes ist, das Du irgendeinem Deiner Geschöpfe versprochen hast oder Gutes, das Du irgendeinem Deiner Diener gibst—so begehre ich es von Dir und bitte Dich darum, o Herr der Welten.
transliteration: Allahumma ma qasura ‘anhu ra’yi wa da’ufa ‘anhu ‘amali wa lam tantahi ilayhi raghbati wa lam tablughhu mas’alati min khayrin wa’adtahu ahadan min khalqika aw khayrin anta mu’tihi ahadan min ‘ibadika fa inni arghabu ilayka fihi wa as’alukahu ya rabbal-‘alamin
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, aklımın yetişemediği, amelimin güç yetiremediği, arzumun ulaşamadığı ve dileğimin erişemediği her hayır—ister yaratıklarından birine vaat ettiğin, ister kullarından birine verdiğin—işte ben onu senden isterim, ey alemlerin Rabbi!

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ اليُسْرَ وَالعَافِيَةَ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ العُسْرِ وَالشَّقَاءِ وَالهَلَكَةِ وَالفَقْرِ وَالفَاقَةِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for ease and well-being, and I seek refuge in You from hardship, misery, destruction, poverty, and need.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Erleichterung und Wohlergehen und suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Schwierigkeiten, Elend, Untergang, Armut und Not.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as’alukal-yusra wal-‘afiyata wa a’udhu bika minal-‘usri wash-shaqa’i wal-halikati wal-faqri wal-faqah
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, senden kolaylık ve afiyet diliyorum, zorluktan, sıkıntıdan, helakten, fakirlikten ve ihtiyaçtan sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنَ الخَيْرِ كُلِّهِ عَاجِلِهِ وَآجِلِهِ مَا عَلِمْتُ مِنْهُ وَمَا لَمْ أَعْلَمْ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الشَّرِّ كُلِّهِ عَاجِلِهِ وَآجِلِهِ مَا عَلِمْتُ مِنْهُ وَمَا لَمْ أَعْلَمْ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for all that is good, in this world and the next, what I know of it and what I do not know. And I seek refuge in You from all that is evil, in this world and the next, what I know of it and what I do not know.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um alles Gute, im Diesseits und Jenseits, was ich davon weiß und was ich nicht weiß. Und ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor allem Bösen, im Diesseits und Jenseits, was ich davon weiß und was ich nicht weiß.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as’aluka minal-khayri kullihi ‘ajilihi wa ajilihi ma ‘alimtu minhu wa ma lam a’lam, wa a’udhu bika minash-sharri kullihi ‘ajilihi wa ajilihi ma ‘alimtu minhu wa ma lam a’lam
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, senden bütün hayırları diliyorum, dünya ve ahirette, bildiğim ve bilmediğim. Ve bütün şerlerden sana sığınıyorum, dünya ve ahirette, bildiğim ve bilmediğim.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ رِضَاكَ وَالجَنَّةَ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ سَخَطِكَ وَالنَّارِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for Your pleasure and Paradise, and I seek refuge in You from Your displeasure and the Fire.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Dein Wohlgefallen und das Paradies, und ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Deinem Zorn und dem Feuer.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as’aluka ridaka wal-jannata wa a’udhu bika min sakhatika wan-nar
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, senden rızanı ve cenneti diliyorum, gazabından ve ateşten sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ العَفْوَ وَالعَافِيَةَ فِي الدِّينِ وَالدُّنْيَا وَالآخِرَةِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in my religion, my worldly life, and my Hereafter.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Vergebung und Wohlergehen in meiner Religion, meinem weltlichen Leben und meinem Jenseits.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as’alukal-‘afwa wal-‘afiyata fid-dini wad-dunya wal-akhirah
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, senden dinimde, dünyamda ve ahiretimde af ve afiyet diliyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الفَوزَ يَوْمَ القَضَاءِ وَعَيْشَ السُّعَدَاءِ وَمُرَافَقَةَ الأَنبِيَاءِ وَالنَّصْرَ عَلَى الأَعْدَاءِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for success on the Day of Judgment, the life of the blessed, the companionship of the prophets, and victory over enemies.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Erfolg am Tag des Gerichts, das Leben der Glücklichen, die Gemeinschaft der Propheten und den Sieg über die Feinde.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as’alukal-fawza yaumal-qada’i wa ‘ayshas-su’ada’i wa murafaqatal-anbiya’i wan-nasra ‘alal-a’da’
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, senden kıyamet gününde kurtuluşu, mutluların hayatını, peygamberlerle beraberliği ve düşmanlara karşı zafer diliyorum.

arabicText: رَبَّنَا أَفْرِغْ عَلَيْنَا صَبْرًا وَثَبِّتْ أَقْدَامَنَا وَانصُرْنَا عَلَى القَوْمِ الكَافِرِينَ
englishTranslation: Our Lord, pour upon us patience and make our steps firm and give us victory over the disbelieving people.
germanTranslation: Unser Herr, gieße Geduld über uns aus, festige unsere Schritte und hilf uns gegen das ungläubige Volk.
transliteration: Rabbana afrigh 'alayna sabran wa thabbit aqdamana wansurna 'alal-qawmil-kafirin
turkishTranslation: Rabbimiz, üzerimize sabır yağdır, ayaklarımızı sabit kıl ve bizi kâfirler topluluğuna karşı yardımınla muzaffer kıl.

arabicText: حَسْبِيَ اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ ۖ وَهُوَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ
englishTranslation: Sufficient for me is Allah; there is no deity except Him. On Him I have relied, and He is the Lord of the Great Throne.
germanTranslation: Allah genügt mir. Es gibt keinen Gott außer Ihm. Auf Ihn verlasse ich mich, und Er ist der Herr des gewaltigen Thrones.
transliteration: Hasbiyallahu la ilaha illa huwa, 'alayhi tawakkaltu wa huwa Rabbul-'arshil-'azim
turkishTranslation: Allah bana yeter, O'ndan başka ilah yoktur. Ben yalnız O'na güvenirim. O, büyük Arş'ın Rabbidir.

arabicText: رَبِّ إِنِّي لِمَا أَنزَلْتَ إِلَيَّ مِنْ خَيْرٍ فَقِيرٌ
englishTranslation: My Lord, indeed I am, for whatever good You would send down to me, in need.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, ich bin bedürftig für das Gute, das Du zu mir herabsendest.
transliteration: Rabbi inni lima anzalta ilayya min khayrin faqir
turkishTranslation: Rabbim, bana indireceğin her hayra muhtacım.

arabicText: لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا أَنتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّي كُنتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ
englishTranslation: There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers.
germanTranslation: Es gibt keinen Gott außer Dir. Preis sei Dir! Ich war wahrlich einer der Ungerechten.
transliteration: La ilaha illa anta subhanaka inni kuntu minaz-zalimin
turkishTranslation: Senden başka ilah yoktur. Seni eksikliklerden uzak tutarım. Ben gerçekten zalimlerden oldum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ، وَالْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ، وَالْبُخْلِ وَالْجُبْنِ، وَضَلَعِ الدَّيْنِ، وَغَلَبَةِ الرِّجَالِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from grief and sadness, from weakness and laziness, from miserliness and cowardice, from being overcome by debt and overpowered by men.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Kummer und Trauer, vor Schwäche und Faulheit, vor Geiz und Feigheit, vor Schuldenlast und der Unterdrückung durch Menschen.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazan, wal-'ajzi wal-kasal, wal-bukhli wal-jubn, wa dala'id-dayn wa ghalabatir-rijal
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Kederden, üzüntüden, acizlikten, tembellikten, cimrilikten, korkaklıktan, borç yükünden ve insanların baskısından sana sığınırım.

arabicText: رَبِّ اشْرَحْ لِي صَدْرِي وَيَسِّرْ لِي أَمْرِي وَاحْلُلْ عُقْدَةً مِّن لِّسَانِي يَفْقَهُوا قَوْلِي
englishTranslation: My Lord, expand for me my breast [with assurance], ease for me my task, and untie the knot from my tongue that they may understand my speech.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, weite mir meine Brust, erleichtere mir meine Aufgabe und löse den Knoten meiner Zunge, damit sie meine Rede verstehen.
transliteration: Rabbi ishrah li sadri wa yassir li amri wahlul 'uqdatan min lisan yafqahu qawli
turkishTranslation: Rabbim! Gönlüme ferahlık ver, işimi kolaylaştır, dilimdeki tutukluğu çöz ki sözümü anlasınlar.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْهُدَى وَالتُّقَى وَالْعَفَافَ وَالْغِنَى
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for guidance, piety, chastity, and self-sufficiency.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Rechtleitung, Gottesfurcht, Keuschheit und Unabhängigkeit.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'alukal-huda wat-tuqa wal-'afafa wal-ghina
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senden hidayet, takva, iffet ve gönül zenginliği istiyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْنِي صَبَّارًا وَاجْعَلْنِي شَكَّارًا
englishTranslation: O Allah, make me patient and make me grateful.
germanTranslation: O Allah, mache mich geduldig und dankbar.
transliteration: Allahummaj'alni sabbaran waj'alni shakkar
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Beni sabırlı ve şükreden bir kul eyle.

arabicText: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ الْعَظِيمِ
englishTranslation: Glory is to Allah and praise is to Him, Glory is to Allah the Almighty.
germanTranslation: Preis sei Allah und Lob sei Ihm, Preis sei Allah, dem Allmächtigen.
transliteration: Subhanallahi wa bihamdihi, subhanallahil-'azim
turkishTranslation: Allah'ı hamd ile tesbih ederim, Yüce Allah'ı tesbih ederim.

arabicText: لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ
englishTranslation: There is no power nor strength except with Allah.
germanTranslation: Es gibt keine Macht und keine Kraft außer durch Allah.
transliteration: La hawla wa la quwwata illa billah
turkishTranslation: Güç ve kuvvet ancak Allah'ın yardımıyla vardır.

arabicText: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
englishTranslation: Our Lord, give us in this world [that which is] good and in the Hereafter [that which is] good and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.
germanTranslation: Unser Herr, gib uns im Diesseits Gutes und im Jenseits Gutes und bewahre uns vor der Strafe des Feuers.
transliteration: Rabbana atina fid-dunya hasanatan wa fil-akhirati hasanatan wa qina 'adhaban-nar
turkishTranslation: Rabbimiz! Bize dünyada da iyilik ver, ahirette de iyilik ver. Bizi ateş azabından koru.
