arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ زَوَالِ نِعْمَتِكَ وَتَحَوُّلِ عَافِيَتِكَ وَفُجَاءَةِ نِقْمَتِكَ وَجَمِيعِ سَخَطِكَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the withdrawal of Your blessing, the change of Your protection, the suddenness of Your punishment, and all Your displeasure.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor dem Entzug Deiner Gnade, der Veränderung Deines Schutzes, der Plötzlichkeit Deiner Strafe und allem, was Deinen Zorn erregt.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min zawali ni'matik, wa tahawwuli 'afiyatik, wa fuja'ati niqmatik, wa jami'i sakhatik
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Nimetinin gitmesinden, afiyetinin değişmesinden, ansızın vereceğin cezadan ve bütün gazabından sana sığınırım.

arabicText: يَا حَيُّ يَا قَيُّومُ بِرَحْمَتِكَ أَسْتَغِيثُ
englishTranslation: O Ever-Living, O Sustainer, by Your mercy I seek help.
germanTranslation: O Ewiglebender, O Allerhalter, durch Deine Barmherzigkeit bitte ich um Hilfe.
transliteration: Ya Hayyu Ya Qayyum birahmatika astaghith
turkishTranslation: Ey Hayy ve Kayyum olan Allah'ım! Rahmetine sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الصَّبْرَ عَلَى قَضَائِكَ وَالرِّضَا بِقَدَرِكَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for patience with Your decree and contentment with Your decree.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Geduld mit Deinem Beschluss und Zufriedenheit mit Deiner Vorherbestimmung.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'alukas-sabra 'ala qada'ik war-rida biqadarik
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senden hükmüne sabır ve kaderine razı olmayı istiyorum.

arabicText: رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِي أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ الَّتِي أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَالِدَيَّ وَأَنْ أَعْمَلَ صَالِحًا تَرْضَاهُ وَأَصْلِحْ لِي فِي ذُرِّيَّتِي
englishTranslation: My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to do righteousness of which You approve. And admit me by Your mercy into [the ranks of] Your righteous servants.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, gib mir ein, für Deine Gnade zu danken, die Du mir und meinen Eltern erwiesen hast, und rechtschaffene Werke zu tun, die Dir gefallen. Und nimm mich durch Deine Barmherzigkeit unter Deine rechtschaffenen Diener auf.
transliteration: Rabbi awzi'ni an ashkura ni'matakallati an'amta 'alayya wa 'ala walidayya wa an a'mala salihan tardahu wa aslih li fi dhurriyyati
turkishTranslation: Rabbim! Bana ve ana-babama verdiğin nimete şükretmemi, hoşnut olacağın salih ameller işlememi nasip et. Benim için de zürriyetim için de ıslah eyle.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ أَصْلِحْ لِي دِينِيَ الَّذِي هُوَ عِصْمَةُ أَمْرِي، وَأَصْلِحْ لِي دُنْيَايَ الَّتِي فِيهَا مَعَاشِي، وَأَصْلِحْ لِي آخِرَتِيَ الَّتِي فِيهَا مَعَادِي، وَاجْعَلِ الحَيَاةَ زِيَادَةً لِي فِي كُلِّ خَيْرٍ، وَاجْعَلِ المَوْتَ رَاحَةً لِي مِن كُلِّ شَرٍّ
englishTranslation: O Allah, rectify for me my religion which is the safeguard of my affairs, rectify for me my worldly life in which is my livelihood, and rectify for me my Hereafter to which is my return. Make life for me an increase in every good and make death for me a relief from every evil.
germanTranslation: O Allah, korrigiere für mich meine Religion, die der Schutz meiner Angelegenheiten ist, korrigiere für mich mein Diesseits, in dem mein Lebensunterhalt liegt, und korrigiere für mich mein Jenseits, zu dem meine Rückkehr ist. Mache das Leben für mich zu einer Zunahme an allem Guten und mache den Tod für mich zu einer Erleichterung von allem Übel.
transliteration: Allahumma aslih li diniyalladhi huwa 'ismatu amri, wa aslih li dunyaya allati fiha ma'ashi, wa aslih li akhirati allati fiha ma'adi, waj'alil-hayata ziyadatan li fi kulli khayr, waj'alil-mawta rahatan li min kulli sharr
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! İşlerimin koruyucusu olan dinimi, geçim kaynağım olan dünyamı ve dönüş yerim olan ahiretimi ıslah eyle. Hayatımı her hayır için bir artış, ölümümü de her şerden bir kurtuluş eyle.

arabicText: رَبَّنَا لَا تُؤَاخِذْنَا إِن نَّسِينَا أَوْ أَخْطَأْنَا
englishTranslation: Our Lord, do not impose blame upon us if we have forgotten or erred.
germanTranslation: Unser Herr, belange uns nicht, wenn wir vergessen oder einen Fehler begehen.
transliteration: Rabbana la tu'akhidhna in nasina aw akhta'na
turkishTranslation: Rabbimiz! Unuttuk ya da yanıldıysak bizi hesaba çekme.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ جَهْدِ البَلَاءِ وَدَرَكِ الشَّقَاءِ وَسُوءِ القَضَاءِ وَشَمَاتَةِ الأَعْدَاءِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the severity of trials, the depths of misery, evil decrees, and the gloating of enemies.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor der Härte der Prüfungen, der Tiefe des Elends, schlechter Vorherbestimmung und dem Hohn der Feinde.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min jahdil-bala'i wa darakish-shaqa'i wa su'il-qada'i wa shamatatil-a'da'i
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Şiddetli belalardan, derin sıkıntılardan, kötü kazalardan ve düşmanların sevinmesinden sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ عِلْمًا نَافِعًا وَرِزْقًا طَيِّبًا وَعَمَلًا مُتَقَبَّلًا
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, wholesome provision, and accepted deeds.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um nützliches Wissen, guten Lebensunterhalt und angenommene Taten.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka 'ilman nafi'an wa rizqan tayyiban wa 'amalan mutaqabbalan
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senden faydalı ilim, helal rızık ve kabul edilen amel istiyorum.

arabicText: حَسْبُنَا اللَّهُ وَنِعْمَ الوَكِيلُ
englishTranslation: Sufficient for us is Allah, and [He is] the best Disposer of affairs.
germanTranslation: Allah genügt uns, und Er ist der beste Anwalt.
transliteration: Hasbunallahu wa ni'mal-wakil
turkishTranslation: Allah bize yeter, O ne güzel vekildir.

arabicText: رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَاجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ وَاجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
englishTranslation: Our Lord, grant us from among our wives and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us an example for the righteous.
germanTranslation: Unser Herr, schenke uns aus unseren Gattinnen und Nachkommen Augentrost und mache uns zu einem Vorbild für die Gottesfürchtigen.
transliteration: Rabbana hab lana min azwajina wa dhurriyyatina qurrata a'yunin waj'alna lil-muttaqina imama.
turkishTranslation: Rabbimiz, bize eşlerimizden ve çocuklarımızdan göz aydınlığı olacak kimseler bağışla ve bizi takva sahiplerine önder kıl.

arabicText: رَبِّ اجْعَلْنِي مُقِيمَ الصَّلَاةِ وَمِنْ ذُرِّيَّتِي رَبَّنَا وَتَقَبَّلْ دُعَاءِ
englishTranslation: My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer, and [many] from my descendants. Our Lord, accept my supplication.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, mache mich und einen Teil meiner Nachkommen zu denen, die das Gebet verrichten. Unser Herr, nimm mein Bittgebet an.
transliteration: Rabbij-'alni muqimas-salati wa min dhurriyyati, Rabbana wa taqabbal du'a.
turkishTranslation: Rabbim, beni namazı dosdoğru kılanlardan eyle, soyumdan da. Rabbimiz, duamı kabul et.

arabicText: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِنَ الصَّالِحِينَ
englishTranslation: My Lord, grant me [a child] from among the righteous.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, schenke mir einen rechtschaffenen (Nachkommen).
transliteration: Rabbi hab li minas-salihin.
turkishTranslation: Rabbim, bana salihlerden (bir evlat) ihsan eyle.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لِي فِي أَهْلِي وَمَالِي
englishTranslation: O Allah, bless me in my family and my wealth.
germanTranslation: O Allah, segne mich in meiner Familie und meinem Besitz.
transliteration: Allahumma barik li fi ahli wa mali.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, aileme ve malıma bereket ver.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ أَصْلِحْ لِي فِي ذُرِّيَّتِي
englishTranslation: O Allah, rectify for me my offspring.
germanTranslation: O Allah, mache meine Nachkommen rechtschaffen für mich.
transliteration: Allahumma aslih li fi dhurriyyati.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, neslimi benim için ıslah eyle.

arabicText: رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِي أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ الَّتِي أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَى وَالِدَيَّ وَأَنْ أَعْمَلَ صَالِحًا تَرْضَاهُ وَأَصْلِحْ لِي فِي ذُرِّيَّتِي
englishTranslation: My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to do righteousness of which You approve. And make righteous for me my offspring.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, gib mir ein, dass ich dankbar sei für Deine Gnade, die Du mir und meinen Eltern erwiesen hast, und dass ich rechtschaffen handle, mit dem Du zufrieden bist. Und mache meine Nachkommen rechtschaffen für mich.
transliteration: Rabbi awzi'ni an ashkura ni'matakallati an'amta 'alayya wa 'ala walidayya wa an a'mala salihan tardahu wa aslih li fi dhurriyyati.
turkishTranslation: Rabbim, bana ve anne-babama verdiğin nimetine şükretmemi ve razı olacağın salih ameller işlememi nasip et. Neslimi de benim için ıslah eyle.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ ذُرِّيَّةً طَيِّبَةً
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for good offspring.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um rechtschaffene Nachkommen.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka dhurriyyatan tayyibatan.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, senden salih bir nesil diliyorum.

arabicText: رَبِّ اجْعَلْنِي وَذُرِّيَّتِي مِنَ الْمُقِيمِينَ الصَّلَاةِ
englishTranslation: My Lord, make me and my descendants establishers of prayer.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, mache mich und meine Nachkommen zu denen, die das Gebet verrichten.
transliteration: Rabbij-'alni wa dhurriyyati minal-muqiminas-salati.
turkishTranslation: Rabbim, beni ve soyumu namazı dosdoğru kılanlardan eyle.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ ارْزُقْنِي الْوَلَدَ الصَّالِحَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, grant me a righteous child.
germanTranslation: O Allah, gewähre mir ein rechtschaffenes Kind.
transliteration: Allahummarzuqnil-waladas-saliha.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, bana salih bir evlat nasip et.

arabicText: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِن لَّدُنكَ ذُرِّيَّةً طَيِّبَةً إِنَّكَ سَمِيعُ الدُّعَاءِ
englishTranslation: My Lord, grant me from Yourself a good offspring. Indeed, You are the Hearer of supplication.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, schenke mir aus Deiner Gnade eine gute Nachkommenschaft. Wahrlich, Du bist der Hörende der Bitte.
transliteration: Rabbi hab li min ladunka dhurriyyatan tayyibatan innaka sami'ud-du'a.
turkishTranslation: Rabbim, bana katından temiz bir nesil bağışla. Şüphesiz Sen duayı işitensin.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ وَفِّقْ أَوْلَادِي لِطَاعَتِكَ وَاحْفَظْهُمْ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, make my children obedient to You and protect them from Satan.
germanTranslation: O Allah, lasse meine Kinder Dir gehorsam sein und beschütze sie vor Satan.
transliteration: Allahumma waffiq awladi li ta'atika wahfazhum minash-shaytan.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, çocuklarımı sana itaat edenlerden eyle ve onları şeytandan koru.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ احْفَظْ عَائِلَتِي بِحِفْظِكَ وَارْزُقْهُمُ الْعَافِيَةَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, protect my family with Your protection and grant them well-being.
germanTranslation: O Allah, beschütze meine Familie mit Deinem Schutz und gewähre ihnen Wohlergehen.
transliteration: Allahummahfaz 'ailati bi hifzika warzuqhumul-'afiyah.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, ailemi korumanla koru ve onlara afiyet nasip et.

arabicText: رَبَّنَا اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الْحِسَابُ
englishTranslation: Our Lord, forgive me and my parents and the believers the Day the account is established.
germanTranslation: Unser Herr, vergib mir und meinen Eltern und den Gläubigen am Tag, an dem die Abrechnung stattfindet.
transliteration: Rabbana-ghfir li wa li walidayya wa lil-mu'minina yawma yaqumul-hisab.
turkishTranslation: Rabbimiz, hesap günü geldiğinde beni, anne-babamı ve müminleri bağışla.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ أَصْلِحْ أَزْوَاجَنَا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنَا
englishTranslation: O Allah, rectify our spouses and our offspring.
germanTranslation: O Allah, mache unsere Ehepartner und Nachkommen rechtschaffen.
transliteration: Allahumma aslih azwajana wa dhurriyyatina.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, eşlerimizi ve çocuklarımızı ıslah eyle.

arabicText: رَبِّ ارْحَمْهُمَا كَمَا رَبَّيَانِي صَغِيرًا
englishTranslation: My Lord, have mercy upon them [my parents] as they brought me up [when I was] small.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, erbarme Dich ihrer (meiner Eltern), wie sie mich aufgezogen haben, als ich klein war.
transliteration: Rabbi-rhamhuma kama rabbayani saghira.
turkishTranslation: Rabbim, onlara (anne-babama) merhamet et, tıpkı beni küçükken yetiştirdikleri gibi.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ أَهْلِي وَأَوْلَادِي مِنَ السَّعِيدِينَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, make my family and my children among the happy ones.
germanTranslation: O Allah, lasse meine Familie und meine Kinder zu den Glücklichen gehören.
transliteration: Allahummaj-'al ahli wa awladi minas-sa'idin.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, ailemi ve çocuklarımı mutlu olanlardan eyle.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ احْفَظْنِي وَأَهْلِي مِنْ كُلِّ شَرٍّ
englishTranslation: O Allah, protect me and my family from all evil.
germanTranslation: O Allah, beschütze mich und meine Familie vor allem Übel.
transliteration: Allahummahfazni wa ahli min kulli sharrin.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, beni ve ailemi her türlü şerden koru.

arabicText: رَبِّ اشْرَحْ لِي صَدْرِي وَيَسِّرْ لِي أَمْرِي وَاحْفَظْ لِي أَهْلِي
englishTranslation: My Lord, expand for me my breast, ease for me my task, and protect for me my family.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, weite mir meine Brust, erleichtere mir meine Angelegenheit und beschütze meine Familie für mich.
transliteration: Rabbi-shrah li sadri wa yassir li amri wahfaz li ahli.
turkishTranslation: Rabbim, göğsümü genişlet, işimi kolaylaştır ve ailemi koru.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ ارْزُقْنِي زَوْجًا صَالِحًا وَذُرِّيَّةً طَيِّبَةً
englishTranslation: O Allah, grant me a righteous spouse and good offspring.
germanTranslation: O Allah, gewähre mir einen rechtschaffenen Ehepartner und gute Nachkommen.
transliteration: Allahummarzuqni zawjan salihan wa dhurriyyatan tayyibatan.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, bana salih bir eş ve temiz bir nesil nasip et.

arabicText: رَبَّنَا تَقَبَّلْ مِنَّا إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
englishTranslation: Our Lord, accept [this] from us. Indeed, You are the Hearing, the Knowing.
germanTranslation: Unser Herr, nimm (dies) von uns an. Wahrlich, Du bist der Hörende, der Wissende.
transliteration: Rabbana taqabbal minna innaka Antas-Sami'ul-'Alim.
turkishTranslation: Rabbimiz, bizden (bu duayı) kabul et. Şüphesiz Sen işitensin, bilensin.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ بَاعِدْ بَيْنِي وَبَيْنَ خَطَايَايَ كَمَا بَاعَدْتَ بَيْنَ المَشْرِقِ وَالمَغْرِبِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, distance me from my sins as You have distanced the east from the west.
germanTranslation: O Allah, entferne mich von meinen Sünden, so wie Du den Osten vom Westen entfernt hast.
transliteration: Allahumma bāʿid baynī wa bayna khaṭāyāya kamā bāʿadta bayna al-mashriqi wa al-maghrib.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, beni günahlarımdan uzaklaştır, tıpkı doğu ile batıyı birbirinden uzaklaştırdığın gibi.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ نَقِّنِي مِنَ الخَطَايَا كَمَا يُنَقَّى الثَّوْبُ الأَبْيَضُ مِنَ الدَّنَسِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, cleanse me of my sins as a white garment is cleansed of dirt.
germanTranslation: O Allah, reinige mich von meinen Sünden, wie ein weißes Kleid von Schmutz gereinigt wird.
transliteration: Allahumma naqqinī min al-khaṭāyā kamā yunaqqā al-thawb al-abyad min al-danas.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, beni günahlarımdan temizle, tıpkı beyaz bir elbisenin kirden temizlendiği gibi.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ فِي قَلْبِي نُورًا، وَفِي بَصَرِي نُورًا، وَفِي سَمْعِي نُورًا، وَعَنْ يَمِينِي نُورًا، وَعَنْ شِمَالِي نُورًا، وَأَمَامِي نُورًا، وَخَلْفِي نُورًا، وَفَوْقِي نُورًا، وَتَحْتِي نُورًا، وَاجْعَلْ لِي نُورًا
englishTranslation: O Allah, place light in my heart, light in my sight, light in my hearing, light on my right, light on my left, light before me, light behind me, light above me, light below me, and make light for me.
germanTranslation: O Allah, gib Licht in mein Herz, Licht in meine Augen, Licht in mein Gehör, Licht zu meiner Rechten, Licht zu meiner Linken, Licht vor mir, Licht hinter mir, Licht über mir, Licht unter mir und mache Licht für mich.
transliteration: Allahumma ijʿal fī qalbī nūran, wa fī baṣarī nūran, wa fī samʿī nūran, wa ʿan yamīnī nūran, wa ʿan shimālī nūran, wa amāmī nūran, wa khalfī nūran, wa fawqī nūran, wa taḥtī nūran, wa ijʿal lī nūran.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, kalbime nur ver, gözüme nur ver, kulağıma nur ver, sağıma nur ver, soluma nur ver, önüme nur ver, arkama nur ver, üstüme nur ver, altıma nur ver ve bana nur ver.

arabicText: سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِكَ، تَبَارَكَ اسْمُكَ، وَتَعَالَى جَدُّكَ، وَلَا إِلَهَ غَيْرُكَ
englishTranslation: Glory be to You, O Allah, and praise be to You. Blessed is Your name, and exalted is Your majesty. There is no god but You.
germanTranslation: Preis sei Dir, o Allah, und Lob sei Dir. Gesegnet ist Dein Name, und erhaben ist Deine Herrschaft. Es gibt keinen Gott außer Dir.
transliteration: Subḥānaka Allāhumma wa bi-ḥamdika, tabāraka ismuka, wa taʿālā jadduka, wa lā ilāha ghayruk.
turkishTranslation: Seni eksikliklerden tenzih ederim Allah'ım ve sana hamd ederim. İsmin mübarektir, şanın yücedir. Senden başka ilah yoktur.

arabicText: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَارْحَمْنِي وَاهْدِنِي وَعَافِنِي وَارْزُقْنِي
englishTranslation: O my Lord, forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, grant me well-being, and provide for me.
germanTranslation: O mein Herr, vergib mir, erbarme Dich meiner, führe mich, gewähre mir Wohlergehen und versorge mich.
transliteration: Rabbighfir lī, warḥamnī, wahdinī, wa ʿāfinī, warzuqnī.
turkishTranslation: Rabbim, beni bağışla, bana merhamet et, bana hidayet ver, bana afiyet ver ve bana rızık ver.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ، وَالْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ، وَالْبُخْلِ وَالْجُبْنِ، وَضَلَعِ الدَّيْنِ وَغَلَبَةِ الرِّجَالِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from grief and sorrow, from weakness and laziness, from miserliness and cowardice, from being overwhelmed by debt and overpowered by men.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Kummer und Trauer, vor Schwäche und Faulheit, vor Geiz und Feigheit, vor Schuldenlast und der Unterdrückung durch Menschen.
transliteration: Allāhumma innī aʿūdhu bika min al-hammi wa al-ḥazan, wa al-ʿajzi wa al-kasal, wa al-bukhl wa al-jubn, wa ḍalaʿi al-dayn wa ghalabati al-rijāl.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senden kederden, üzüntüden, acizlikten, tembellikten, cimrilikten, korkaklıktan, borç yükünden ve insanların baskısından sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ، وَمِنْ عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ، وَمِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَحْيَا وَالْمَمَاتِ، وَمِنْ شَرِّ فِتْنَةِ الْمَسِيحِ الدَّجَّالِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave, from the torment of Hellfire, from the trials of life and death, and from the evil of the False Messiah.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor der Qual des Grabes, vor der Strafe des Höllenfeuers, vor den Prüfungen des Lebens und des Todes und vor dem Übel des falschen Messias.
transliteration: Allāhumma innī aʿūdhu bika min ʿadhābi al-qabr, wa min ʿadhābi jahannam, wa min fitnati al-maḥyā wa al-mamāt, wa min sharri fitnati al-masīḥ al-dajjāl.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senden kabir azabından, cehennem azabından, hayat ve ölüm fitnesinden ve Deccal fitnesinin şerrinden sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْهُدَى وَالتُّقَى وَالْعَفَافَ وَالْغِنَى
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for guidance, piety, chastity, and self-sufficiency.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Rechtleitung, Gottesfurcht, Keuschheit und Unabhängigkeit.
transliteration: Allāhumma innī as'aluka al-hudā wa al-tuqā wa al-ʿafāf wa al-ghinā.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senden hidayet, takva, iffet ve zenginlik (gönül zenginliği) istiyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ زَوَالِ نِعْمَتِكَ، وَتَحَوُّلِ عَافِيَتِكَ، وَفُجَاءَةِ نِقْمَتِكَ، وَجَمِيعِ سَخَطِكَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the removal of Your blessings, the change in Your protection, the suddenness of Your punishment, and all forms of Your displeasure.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor dem Entzug Deiner Gaben, der Veränderung Deines Schutzes, dem plötzlichen Eintreffen Deiner Strafe und jeglichem Zorn von Dir.
transliteration: Allāhumma innī aʿūdhu bika min zawāli niʿmatika, wa taḥawwuli ʿāfiyatika, wa fujā'ati niqmatika, wa jamīʿi sakhaṭika.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Nimetlerinin yok olmasından, afiyetinin değişmesinden, ansızın gelecek cezandan ve bütün gazabından sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ أَحْسِنْ عَاقِبَتَنَا فِي الأُمُورِ كُلِّهَا، وَأَجِرْنَا مِنْ خِزْيِ الدُّنْيَا وَعَذَابِ الآخِرَةِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, make our end good in all matters, and save us from the disgrace of this world and the punishment of the Hereafter.
germanTranslation: O Allah, mache unser Ende in allen Angelegenheiten gut und bewahre uns vor der Schande dieser Welt und der Strafe des Jenseits.
transliteration: Allāhumma aḥsin ʿāqibatanā fī al-umūri kullihā, wa ajirnā min khizyi al-dunyā wa ʿadhābi al-ākhira.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, bütün işlerimizin sonunu güzel eyle ve bizi dünyanın rezilliğinden ve ahiret azabından koru.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ فِعْلَ الْخَيْرَاتِ، وَتَرْكَ الْمُنْكَرَاتِ، وَحُبَّ الْمَسَاكِينِ، وَأَنْ تَغْفِرَ لِي وَتَرْحَمَنِي
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You to enable me to do good deeds, abandon evil deeds, love the poor, and that You forgive me and have mercy on me.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich darum, gute Taten zu vollbringen, Schlechtes zu unterlassen, die Armen zu lieben und dass Du mir vergibst und Dich meiner erbarmst.
transliteration: Allāhumma innī as'aluka fiʿla al-khayrāt, wa tarka al-munkarāt, wa ḥubba al-masākīn, wa an taghfira lī wa tarḥamanī.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senden hayırlı işler yapmayı, kötülükleri terk etmeyi, fakirleri sevmeyi, beni bağışlamanı ve bana merhamet etmeni istiyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ جَهْدِ الْبَلَاءِ، وَدَرَكِ الشَّقَاءِ، وَسُوءِ الْقَضَاءِ، وَشَمَاتَةِ الأَعْدَاءِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from severe calamity, from misery, from bad fate, and from the gloating of enemies.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor schweren Prüfungen, vor Unglück, vor schlechter Vorherbestimmung und vor der Schadenfreude der Feinde.
transliteration: Allāhumma innī aʿūdhu bika min jahdi al-balā', wa daraki al-shaqā', wa sū'i al-qaḍā', wa shamātati al-aʿdā'.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senden şiddetli belalardan, felakete düşmekten, kötü kazadan ve düşmanların sevinmesinden sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنَ الْخَيْرِ كُلِّهِ عَاجِلِهِ وَآجِلِهِ مَا عَلِمْتُ مِنْهُ وَمَا لَمْ أَعْلَمْ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الشَّرِّ كُلِّهِ عَاجِلِهِ وَآجِلِهِ مَا عَلِمْتُ مِنْهُ وَمَا لَمْ أَعْلَمْ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for all that is good, in this world and the next, what I know of it and what I do not know. And I seek refuge in You from all evil, in this world and the next, what I know of it and what I do not know.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um alles Gute, im Diesseits und Jenseits, was ich davon weiß und was ich nicht weiß. Und ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor allem Übel, im Diesseits und Jenseits, was ich davon weiß und was ich nicht weiß.
transliteration: Allāhumma innī as'aluka min al-khayri kullihi ʿājilihi wa ājilihi mā ʿalimtu minhu wa mā lam aʿlam, wa aʿūdhu bika min al-sharri kullihi ʿājilihi wa ājilihi mā ʿalimtu minhu wa mā lam aʿlam.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senden bütün hayırları istiyorum; dünyaya ve ahirete ait, bildiğim ve bilmediğim. Bütün kötülüklerden de sana sığınıyorum; dünyaya ve ahirete ait, bildiğim ve bilmediğim.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَفْوَ وَالْعَافِيَةَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالآخِرَةِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in this world and the Hereafter.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Vergebung und Wohlergehen im Diesseits und im Jenseits.
transliteration: Allāhumma innī as'aluka al-ʿafwa wa al-ʿāfiyata fī al-dunyā wa al-ākhira.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senden dünya ve ahirette af ve afiyet diliyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ صِحَّةً فِي إِيمَانٍ، وَإِيمَانًا فِي حُسْنِ خُلُقٍ، وَنَجَاحًا يَتْبَعُهُ فَلَاحٌ، وَرَحْمَةً مِنْكَ وَعَافِيَةً، وَمَغْفِرَةً مِنْكَ وَرِضْوَانًا
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for soundness in faith, faith accompanied by good character, success followed by prosperity, Your mercy, well-being, Your forgiveness, and Your pleasure.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Gesundheit im Glauben, Glauben mit gutem Charakter, Erfolg mit Wohlergehen, Deine Barmherzigkeit, Wohlergehen, Deine Vergebung und Dein Wohlgefallen.
transliteration: Allāhumma innī as'aluka ṣiḥḥatan fī īmānin, wa īmānan fī ḥusni khuluqin, wa najāḥan yatbaʿuhu falāḥun, wa raḥmatan minka wa ʿāfiyatan, wa maghfiratan minka wa riḍwānan.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senden imanda sağlık, güzel ahlakla beraber iman, başarı ve mutluluk, rahmetin, afiyet, mağfiretin ve rızanı istiyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا عَمِلْتُ وَمِنْ شَرِّ مَا لَمْ أَعْمَلْ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done and from the evil of what I have not done.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor dem Übel dessen, was ich getan habe, und vor dem Übel dessen, was ich nicht getan habe.
transliteration: Allāhumma innī aʿūdhu bika min sharri mā ʿamiltu wa min sharri mā lam aʿmal.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Yaptıklarımın şerrinden ve yapmadıklarımın şerrinden sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْكَسَلِ وَالْهَرَمِ، وَالْمَأْثَمِ وَالْمَغْرَمِ، وَمِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْقَبْرِ وَعَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from laziness and old age, from sin and debt, from the trial of the grave and the punishment of the grave.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Faulheit und Alter, vor Sünde und Schulden, vor der Prüfung des Grabes und der Strafe des Grabes.
transliteration: Allāhumma innī aʿūdhu bika min al-kasal wa al-haram, wa al-ma'tham wa al-maghram, wa min fitnati al-qabr wa ʿadhābi al-qabr.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senden tembellikten, ihtiyarlıktan, günahtan, borçtan, kabir fitnesinden ve kabir azabından sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ حُبَّكَ وَحُبَّ مَنْ يُحِبُّكَ، وَالْعَمَلَ الَّذِي يُبَلِّغُنِي حُبَّكَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for Your love, the love of those who love You, and deeds that will bring me closer to Your love.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Deine Liebe, die Liebe derer, die Dich lieben, und um Taten, die mich Deiner Liebe näherbringen.
transliteration: Allāhumma innī as'aluka ḥubbaka wa ḥubba man yuḥibbuka, wa al-ʿamala alladhī yuballighunī ḥubbaka.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senden senin sevgini, seni sevenlerin sevgisini ve beni senin sevgine ulaştıracak amelleri istiyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عِلْمٍ لَا يَنْفَعُ، وَمِنْ قَلْبٍ لَا يَخْشَعُ، وَمِنْ نَفْسٍ لَا تَشْبَعُ، وَمِنْ دَعْوَةٍ لَا يُسْتَجَابُ لَهَا
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from knowledge that does not benefit, from a heart that does not humble itself, from a soul that is never satisfied, and from a supplication that is not answered.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor nutzlosem Wissen, vor einem Herzen, das nicht demütig ist, vor einer Seele, die nie zufrieden ist, und vor einem Bittgebet, das nicht erhört wird.
transliteration: Allāhumma innī aʿūdhu bika min ʿilmin lā yanfaʿu, wa min qalbin lā yakhshaʿu, wa min nafsin lā tashbaʿu, wa min daʿwatin lā yustajābu lahā.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Faydasız ilimden, huşû duymayan kalpten, doymayan nefisten ve kabul edilmeyen duadan sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ رِضَاكَ وَالْجَنَّةَ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ سَخَطِكَ وَالنَّارِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for Your pleasure and Paradise, and I seek refuge in You from Your displeasure and the Fire.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Dein Wohlgefallen und das Paradies, und ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Deinem Zorn und dem Höllenfeuer.
transliteration: Allāhumma innī as'aluka riḍāka wa al-jannah, wa aʿūdhu bika min sakhaṭika wa al-nār.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senden rızanı ve cenneti istiyorum, gazabından ve cehennemden sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ عِلْمًا نَافِعًا، وَرِزْقًا طَيِّبًا، وَعَمَلًا مُتَقَبَّلًا
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, goodly provision, and accepted deeds.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um nützliches Wissen, guten Lebensunterhalt und angenommene Taten.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka 'ilman nafi'an, wa rizqan tayyiban, wa 'amalan mutaqabbalan.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senden faydalı ilim, helal rızık ve kabul edilen amel istiyorum.

arabicText: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَهَبْ لِي مُلْكًا لَا يَنْبَغِي لِأَحَدٍ مِنْ بَعْدِي
englishTranslation: My Lord, forgive me and grant me a kingdom such as will not belong to anyone after me.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, vergib mir und gewähre mir ein Königreich, das nach mir niemandem zusteht.
transliteration: Rabbighfir li wa hab li mulkan la yanbaghi li ahadin min ba'di.
turkishTranslation: Rabbim, beni bağışla ve bana benden sonra kimseye nasip olmayacak bir mülk ver.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اكْفِنِي بِحَلَالِكَ عَنْ حَرَامِكَ، وَأَغْنِنِي بِفَضْلِكَ عَمَّنْ سِوَاكَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, suffice me with what You have made lawful instead of what You have made unlawful, and enrich me by Your bounty so that I have no need of anyone besides You.
germanTranslation: O Allah, versorge mich mit dem, was Du erlaubt hast, anstelle des Verbotenen, und bereichere mich durch Deine Gunst, sodass ich niemanden außer Dir brauche.
transliteration: Allahumma-kfini bi halalika 'an haramik, wa aghnini bi fadlika 'amman siwak.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, helal kıldıklarınla beni haramlarından koru ve lütfunla beni Senden başkasına muhtaç etme.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْفَقْرِ، وَالْقِلَّةِ، وَالذِّلَّةِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ أَنْ أَظْلِمَ أَوْ أُظْلَمَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from poverty, scarcity, and humiliation, and I seek refuge in You from oppressing or being oppressed.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Armut, Mangel und Erniedrigung, und ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir davor, zu unterdrücken oder unterdrückt zu werden.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min al-faqri, wa al-qillati, wa adh-dhillati, wa a'udhu bika min an azlima aw uzlam.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senden fakirlikten, yokluktan ve zilletten sana sığınırım. Zulmetmekten veya zulme uğramaktan da sana sığınırım.

arabicText: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
englishTranslation: Our Lord, give us in this world good and in the Hereafter good, and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.
germanTranslation: Unser Herr, gib uns im Diesseits Gutes und im Jenseits Gutes und bewahre uns vor der Strafe des Feuers.
transliteration: Rabbana atina fid-dunya hasanatan wa fil-akhirati hasanatan wa qina 'adhaban-nar.
turkishTranslation: Rabbimiz! Bize dünyada da iyilik ver, ahirette de iyilik ver ve bizi cehennem azabından koru.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ ارْزُقْنِي حُبَّكَ وَحُبَّ مَنْ يَنْفَعُنِي حُبُّهُ عِنْدَكَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, grant me Your love and the love of those whose love will benefit me with You.
germanTranslation: O Allah, gewähre mir Deine Liebe und die Liebe derer, deren Liebe mir bei Dir nützt.
transliteration: Allahumma-rzuqni hubbaka wa hubba man yanfa'uni hubbuhu 'indak.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Bana Senin sevgini ve Senin katında faydası olanların sevgisini nasip et.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ أَصْلِحْ لِي دِينِيَ الَّذِي هُوَ عِصْمَةُ أَمْرِي، وَأَصْلِحْ لِي دُنْيَايَ الَّتِي فِيهَا مَعَاشِي
englishTranslation: O Allah, rectify for me my religion, which is the safeguard of my affairs, and rectify for me my worldly life in which is my livelihood.
germanTranslation: O Allah, korrigiere für mich meine Religion, die der Schutz meiner Angelegenheiten ist, und korrigiere für mich mein weltliches Leben, in dem mein Lebensunterhalt liegt.
transliteration: Allahumma aslih li diniya alladhi huwa 'ismatu amri, wa aslih li dunyaya allati fiha ma'ashi.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! İşlerimin güvencesi olan dinimi düzelt. Geçim kaynağım olan dünyamı da düzelt.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ وَرَحْمَتِكَ، فَإِنَّهُ لَا يَمْلِكُهَا إِلَّا أَنْتَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You of Your bounty and mercy, for none possesses them except You.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Deine Gunst und Barmherzigkeit, denn niemand außer Dir besitzt sie.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka min fadlika wa rahmatik, fa innahu la yamlikuha illa ant.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senden fazlını ve rahmetini istiyorum, çünkü onlara ancak Sen sahipsin.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ رِزْقًا وَاسِعًا حَلَالًا طَيِّبًا
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for abundant, lawful, and pure provision.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um reichlichen, erlaubten und reinen Lebensunterhalt.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka rizqan wasi'an halalan tayyiban.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senden bol, helal ve temiz rızık istiyorum.

arabicText: رَبِّ اشْرَحْ لِي صَدْرِي وَيَسِّرْ لِي أَمْرِي وَاحْلُلْ عُقْدَةً مِنْ لِسَانِي يَفْقَهُوا قَوْلِي
englishTranslation: My Lord, expand for me my breast, ease for me my task, and untie the knot from my tongue that they may understand my speech.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, weite mir meine Brust, erleichtere mir meine Aufgabe und löse den Knoten von meiner Zunge, damit sie meine Rede verstehen.
transliteration: Rabbishrah li sadri wa yassir li amri, wahlul 'uqdatan min lisanī yafqahu qawli.
turkishTranslation: Rabbim! Göğsümü genişlet, işimi kolaylaştır, dilimdeki düğümü çöz ki sözümü anlasınlar.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْهُدَى وَالتُّقَى وَالْعَفَافَ وَالْغِنَى
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for guidance, piety, chastity, and self-sufficiency.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Rechtleitung, Gottesfurcht, Keuschheit und Unabhängigkeit.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka al-huda wa at-tuqa wa al-'afafa wa al-ghina.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senden hidayet, takva, iffet ve zenginlik istiyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ مَالِكَ الْمُلْكِ تُؤْتِي الْمُلْكَ مَنْ تَشَاءُ وَتَنْزِعُ الْمُلْكَ مِمَّنْ تَشَاءُ وَتُعِزُّ مَنْ تَشَاءُ وَتُذِلُّ مَنْ تَشَاءُ بِيَدِكَ الْخَيْرُ إِنَّكَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
englishTranslation: O Allah, Owner of Sovereignty, You give sovereignty to whom You will and take sovereignty away from whom You will. You honor whom You will and humble whom You will. In Your hand is all good. Indeed, You are over all things competent.
germanTranslation: O Allah, Besitzer der Herrschaft, Du gibst die Herrschaft, wem Du willst, und entziehst sie, wem Du willst. Du ehrst, wen Du willst, und erniedrigst, wen Du willst. In Deiner Hand ist alles Gute. Wahrlich, Du hast Macht über alle Dinge.
transliteration: Allahumma malikal-mulki tu'til-mulka man tasha'u wa tanzi'ul-mulka mimman tasha'u wa tu'izzu man tasha'u wa tudhillu man tasha'u, bi yadikal-khayr, innaka 'ala kulli shay'in qadir.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Mülkün sahibi sensin. Sen mülkü dilediğine verir, dilediğinden alırsın. Dilediğini aziz eder, dilediğini zelil edersin. Hayır Senin elindedir. Şüphesiz Sen her şeye kadirsin.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ خَيْرِ مَا سَأَلَكَ مِنْهُ نَبِيُّكَ مُحَمَّدٌ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for the good of what Your Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him) asked You for.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um das Gute, worum Dein Prophet Muhammad (Friede sei mit ihm) Dich gebeten hat.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka min khayri ma sa'alaka minhu nabiyyuka Muhammadun sallallahu 'alayhi wa sallam.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Peygamberin Muhammed'in (s.a.v.) Senden istediği hayırlı şeyleri ben de Senden istiyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْنِي مِنَ الَّذِينَ إِذَا أَصَابَهُمُ الْخَيْرُ حَمِدُوا وَإِذَا أَصَابَهُمُ الْبَلَاءُ صَبَرُوا
englishTranslation: O Allah, make me among those who, when blessed with good, are grateful, and when afflicted with calamity, are patient.
germanTranslation: O Allah, mache mich zu denen, die, wenn sie mit Gutem gesegnet sind, dankbar sind, und wenn sie mit Prüfungen heimgesucht werden, geduldig sind.
transliteration: Allahummaj'alni min alladhina idha asabahumul-khayru hamadu, wa idha asabahumul-bala'u sabaru.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Beni, kendilerine hayır verildiğinde şükreden, belaya uğradıklarında sabredenlerden eyle.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لِي فِيمَا رَزَقْتَنِي وَقِنِي عَذَابَ النَّارِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, bless me in what You have provided me and protect me from the punishment of the Fire.
germanTranslation: O Allah, segne mich in dem, was Du mir gegeben hast, und bewahre mich vor der Strafe des Feuers.
transliteration: Allahumma barik li fima razaqtani wa qini 'adhaban-nar.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Bana verdiğin rızıkta bereket kıl ve beni ateş azabından koru.

arabicText: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا وَهَبْ لَنَا مِنْ لَدُنْكَ رَحْمَةً إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْوَهَّابُ
englishTranslation: Our Lord, do not let our hearts deviate after You have guided us. Grant us Your mercy, for You are the Bestower.
germanTranslation: Unser Herr, lass unsere Herzen nicht abschweifen, nachdem Du uns rechtgeleitet hast. Gewähre uns Deine Barmherzigkeit, denn Du bist der Gabenverleiher.
transliteration: Rabbana la tuzigh qulubana ba'da idh hadaytana wa hab lana min ladunka rahmatan innaka antal-wahhab.
turkishTranslation: Rabbimiz! Bizi doğru yola ilettikten sonra kalplerimizi eğriltme. Bize katından bir rahmet bağışla. Şüphesiz Sen çok bağışlayansın.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ زَوَالِ نِعْمَتِكَ وَتَحَوُّلِ عَافِيَتِكَ وَفُجَاءَةِ نِقْمَتِكَ وَجَمِيعِ سَخَطِكَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the removal of Your blessings, the change in Your protection, the suddenness of Your punishment, and all that displeases You.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir davor, dass Deine Gaben verschwinden, Dein Schutz sich ändert, Deine Strafe plötzlich kommt und vor allem, was Dich erzürnt.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min zawali ni'matik, wa tahawwuli 'afiyatik, wa fuja'ati niqmatik, wa jami'i sakhatik.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Nimetlerinin yok olmasından, afiyetinin değişmesinden, cezanın aniden gelmesinden ve bütün gazabından Sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ فِعْلَ الْخَيْرَاتِ وَتَرْكَ الْمُنْكَرَاتِ وَحُبَّ الْمَسَاكِينِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for the ability to do good deeds, abandon evil deeds, and love the poor.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um die Fähigkeit, gute Taten zu vollbringen, schlechte Taten zu unterlassen und die Armen zu lieben.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka fi'lal-khayrati wa tarkal-munkarati wa hubbal-masakin.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senden hayırları yapmayı, kötülükleri terk etmeyi ve fakirleri sevmeyi istiyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْجَنَّةَ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ النَّارِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for Paradise and seek refuge in You from the Fire.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um das Paradies und suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor dem Feuer.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'alukal-jannata wa a'udhu bika minan-nar.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senden cenneti istiyorum ve cehennemden Sana sığınıyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الرِّضَا بَعْدَ الْقَضَاءِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for contentment after Your decree.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Zufriedenheit nach Deinem Beschluss.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka ar-rida ba'dal-qada.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Hükmettikten sonra razı olmayı Senden istiyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ عِلْمًا نَافِعًا وَرِزْقًا وَاسِعًا وَعَمَلًا مُتَقَبَّلًا
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, abundant provision, and accepted deeds.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um nützliches Wissen, reichlichen Lebensunterhalt und angenommene Taten.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka 'ilman nafi'an wa rizqan wasi'an wa 'amalan mutaqabbalan.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım! Senden faydalı ilim, bol rızık ve kabul edilen amel istiyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لَهُ وَارْحَمْهُ وَعَافِهِ وَاعْفُ عَنْهُ
englishTranslation: O Allah, forgive him, have mercy on him, grant him safety, and pardon him.
germanTranslation: O Allah, vergib ihm, habe Erbarmen mit ihm, gewähre ihm Sicherheit und verzeihe ihm.
transliteration: Allahumma ighfir lahu warhamhu wa 'afihi wa'fu 'anhu
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, onu bağışla, ona merhamet et, ona afiyet ver ve onu affet.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِحَيِّنَا وَمَيِّتِنَا وَشَاهِدِنَا وَغَائِبِنَا وَصَغِيرِنَا وَكَبِيرِنَا وَذَكَرِنَا وَأُنْثَانَا
englishTranslation: O Allah, forgive our living and our dead, those present and those absent, our young and our old, our males and our females.
germanTranslation: O Allah, vergib unseren Lebenden und unseren Toten, unseren Anwesenden und Abwesenden, unseren Jungen und Alten, unseren Männern und Frauen.
transliteration: Allahumma ighfir lihayyina wa mayyitina wa shahidina wa gha'ibina wa sagheerina wa kabeerina wa thakarina wa unthana
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, dirilerimizi ve ölülerimizi, hazır olanlarımızı ve gaip olanlarımızı, küçüklerimizi ve büyüklerimizi, erkeklerimizi ve kadınlarımızı bağışla.

arabicText: إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُونَ
englishTranslation: Indeed, we belong to Allah, and indeed to Him we will return.
germanTranslation: Wahrlich, wir gehören Allah, und wahrlich zu Ihm kehren wir zurück.
transliteration: Inna lillahi wa inna ilayhi raji'un
turkishTranslation: Şüphesiz biz Allah'a aidiz ve şüphesiz O'na döneceğiz.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ أَجِرْنِي فِي مُصِيبَتِي وَاخْلُفْ لِي خَيْرًا مِنْهَا
englishTranslation: O Allah, reward me in my affliction and replace it for me with something better.
germanTranslation: O Allah, belohne mich in meinem Unglück und ersetze es mir durch etwas Besseres.
transliteration: Allahumma ajirni fi museebati wakhluf li khayran minha
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, beni musibetimde mükafatlandır ve onun yerine bana daha hayırlısını ver.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ ثَبِّتْهُ بِالْقَوْلِ الثَّابِتِ فِي الْحَيَاةِ الدُّنْيَا وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, make him firm with the firm word in this life and the Hereafter.
germanTranslation: O Allah, festige ihn mit dem festen Wort im diesseitigen Leben und im Jenseits.
transliteration: Allahumma thabbit-hu bil-qawli-th-thabiti fil-hayati-d-dunya wa fil-akhirati
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, onu dünya hayatında ve ahirette sabit bir sözle sabit kıl.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ لاَ تَحْرِمْنَا أَجْرَهُ وَلاَ تَفْتِنَّا بَعْدَهُ
englishTranslation: O Allah, do not deprive us of his reward, and do not subject us to trials after him.
germanTranslation: O Allah, beraube uns nicht seines Lohnes und prüfe uns nicht nach ihm.
transliteration: Allahumma la tahrimna ajrahu wa la taftinna ba'dahu
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, bizi onun ecrinden mahrum etme ve ondan sonra bizi fitneye düşürme.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِفُلَانٍ وَارْفَعْ دَرَجَتَهُ فِي الْمَهْدِيِّينَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, forgive so-and-so and elevate his status among the guided ones.
germanTranslation: O Allah, vergib dem Soundso und erhöhe seinen Rang unter den Rechtgeleiteten.
transliteration: Allahumma ighfir li fulan warfa' darajatahu fil-mahdiyyin
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, falan kişiyi bağışla ve onun derecesini hidayete ermişler arasında yükselt.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ أَعِذْهُ مِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ وَعَذَابِ النَّارِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, protect him from the torment of the grave and the punishment of the Fire.
germanTranslation: O Allah, beschütze ihn vor der Qual des Grabes und der Strafe des Feuers.
transliteration: Allahumma a'ith-hu min 'adhabi-l-qabri wa 'adhabi-n-nar
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, onu kabir azabından ve cehennem ateşinin azabından koru.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ قَبْرَهُ رَوْضَةً مِنْ رِيَاضِ الْجَنَّةِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, make his grave a garden from the gardens of Paradise.
germanTranslation: O Allah, mache sein Grab zu einem Garten aus den Gärten des Paradieses.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'al qabrahu rawdatan min riyadi-l-jannah
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, onun kabrini cennet bahçelerinden bir bahçe eyle.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ أَبْدِلْهُ دَارًا خَيْرًا مِنْ دَارِهِ وَأَهْلًا خَيْرًا مِنْ أَهْلِهِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, replace his home with a better home and his family with a better family.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ersetze sein Heim durch ein besseres Heim und seine Familie durch eine bessere Familie.
transliteration: Allahumma abdilhu daran khayran min darihi wa ahlan khayran min ahlihi
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, onun evini daha hayırlı bir evle, ailesini daha hayırlı bir aileyle değiştir.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْزِلْ عَلَى قَبْرِهِ الضِّيَاءَ وَالنُّورَ وَالْفَرَحَ وَالسُّرُورَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, send down upon his grave light, illumination, joy, and happiness.
germanTranslation: O Allah, sende auf sein Grab Licht, Erleuchtung, Freude und Glück herab.
transliteration: Allahumma anzil 'ala qabrihi-d-diya'a wan-nura wal-faraha was-surur
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, onun kabrine ışık, nur, sevinç ve mutluluk indir.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اكْتُبْهُ عِنْدَكَ فِي الْغُرِّ الْمُحَجَّلِينَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, record him with You among the foremost.
germanTranslation: O Allah, schreibe ihn bei Dir unter den Vorreitern ein.
transliteration: Allahumma uktubhu 'indaka fil-ghurri-l-muhajjalin
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, onu Senin katında öncüler arasına yaz.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْهُ مِنَ الْفَائِزِينَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, make him among the successful ones.
germanTranslation: O Allah, mache ihn zu einem der Erfolgreichen.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'alhu minal-fa'izin
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, onu kurtuluşa erenlerden eyle.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ ارْزُقْهُ الْجَنَّةَ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
englishTranslation: O Allah, grant him Paradise without reckoning.
germanTranslation: O Allah, gewähre ihm das Paradies ohne Abrechnung.
transliteration: Allahumma urzuqhu-l-jannata bighayri hisab
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, onu hesapsız bir şekilde cennetle rızıklandır.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اغْسِلْهُ بِالْمَاءِ وَالثَّلْجِ وَالْبَرَدِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, wash him with water, snow, and hail.
germanTranslation: O Allah, wasche ihn mit Wasser, Schnee und Hagel.
transliteration: Allahumma ighsilhu bil-ma'i wath-thalji wal-barad
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, onu su, kar ve dolu ile yıka.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ نَقِّهِ مِنَ الذُّنُوبِ كَمَا يُنَقَّى الثَّوْبُ الْأَبْيَضُ مِنَ الدَّنَسِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, purify him of sins as a white garment is purified of filth.
germanTranslation: O Allah, reinige ihn von Sünden, wie ein weißes Gewand von Schmutz gereinigt wird.
transliteration: Allahumma naqqihi minadh-dhunubi kama yunaqqa-th-thawbu-l-abyadhu minad-danas
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, onu günahlardan temizle, tıpkı beyaz elbisenin kirden temizlendiği gibi.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ أَلْحِقْهُ بِالصَّالِحِينَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, join him with the righteous.
germanTranslation: O Allah, füge ihn den Rechtschaffenen bei.
transliteration: Allahumma alhiqhu bis-salihin
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, onu salihlerle bir araya getir.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ أَعْطِهِ فِي الْجَنَّةِ مَنْزِلًا حَسَنًا
englishTranslation: O Allah, grant him a beautiful abode in Paradise.
germanTranslation: O Allah, gewähre ihm eine schöne Wohnstätte im Paradies.
transliteration: Allahumma a'thi fil-jannati manzilan hasanan
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, ona cennette güzel bir makam ver.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْهُ فِي كَنَفِكَ وَأَمَانِكَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, place him under Your protection and security.
germanTranslation: O Allah, platziere ihn unter Deinem Schutz und Deiner Sicherheit.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'alhu fi kanafika wa amanika
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, onu Senin koruman ve emniyetin altına al.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ أَظِلَّهُ فِي ظِلِّكَ يَوْمَ لَا ظِلَّ إِلَّا ظِلُّكَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, shade him under Your shade on the Day when there is no shade except Yours.
germanTranslation: O Allah, beschatte ihn unter Deinem Schatten am Tag, an dem es keinen Schatten außer Deinem gibt.
transliteration: Allahumma adhillahu fi zillika yawma la zilla illa zilluk
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, onu Senin gölgenden başka gölgenin olmadığı günde Senin gölgende gölgelendir.

arabicText: رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَاجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ وَاجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
englishTranslation: Our Lord, grant us from among our spouses and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us an example for the righteous.
germanTranslation: Unser Herr, schenke uns aus unseren Gattinnen und Nachkommen Augentrost und mache uns zu einem Vorbild für die Gottesfürchtigen.
transliteration: Rabbana hab lana min azwajina wa dhurriyatina qurrata a'yunin waj'alna lil-muttaqina imama.
turkishTranslation: Rabbimiz, bize eşlerimizden ve çocuklarımızdan göz aydınlığı ver ve bizi takva sahiplerine önder kıl.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ فِي قَلْبِي نُورًا وَفِي بَصَرِي نُورًا وَفِي سَمْعِي نُورًا وَعَنْ يَمِينِي نُورًا وَعَنْ شِمَالِي نُورًا وَأَمَامِي نُورًا وَخَلْفِي نُورًا وَفَوْقِي نُورًا وَتَحْتِي نُورًا وَاجْعَلْ لِي نُورًا
englishTranslation: O Allah, place light in my heart, light in my sight, light in my hearing, light on my right, light on my left, light before me, light behind me, light above me, light below me, and make light for me.
germanTranslation: O Allah, lege Licht in mein Herz, Licht in mein Sehen, Licht in mein Hören, Licht zu meiner Rechten, Licht zu meiner Linken, Licht vor mir, Licht hinter mir, Licht über mir, Licht unter mir und mache Licht für mich.
transliteration: Allahumma-j'al fi qalbi nura wa fi basari nura wa fi sam'i nura wa 'an yamini nura wa 'an shimali nura wa amami nura wa khalfi nura wa fawqi nura wa tahti nura waj'al li nura.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, kalbime nur koy, gözüme nur koy, kulağıma nur koy, sağıma nur koy, soluma nur koy, önüme nur koy, arkama nur koy, üstüme nur koy, altıma nur koy ve bana nur ver.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ أَلِّفْ بَيْنَ قُلُوبِنَا وَأَصْلِحْ ذَاتَ بَيْنِنَا وَاهْدِنَا سُبُلَ السَّلَامِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, bring harmony between our hearts, reconcile our relations, and guide us to the paths of peace.
germanTranslation: O Allah, schaffe Harmonie zwischen unseren Herzen, versöhne unsere Beziehungen und führe uns auf die Wege des Friedens.
transliteration: Allahumma allif bayna qulubina wa aslih dhat baynina wahdina subul as-salam.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, kalplerimiz arasında sevgi ve uyum oluştur, aramızı düzelt ve bizi barış yollarına ilet.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ ارْزُقْنِي حُبَّكَ وَحُبَّ مَنْ يَنْفَعُنِي حُبُّهُ عِنْدَكَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, grant me Your love and the love of those whose love will benefit me in Your sight.
germanTranslation: O Allah, gewähre mir Deine Liebe und die Liebe derer, deren Liebe mir bei Dir nützt.
transliteration: Allahumma-rzuqni hubbaka wa hubba man yanfa'uni hubbuhu 'indaka.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, bana Senin sevgini ve Senin katında sevgisi bana fayda verecek olanların sevgisini nasip et.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ حُبَّكَ وَحُبَّ مَنْ يُحِبُّكَ وَحُبَّ عَمَلٍ يُقَرِّبُنِي إِلَى حُبِّكَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for Your love, the love of those who love You, and the love of deeds that bring me closer to Your love.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Deine Liebe, die Liebe derer, die Dich lieben, und die Liebe zu Taten, die mich Deiner Liebe näherbringen.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka hubbaka wa hubba man yuhibbuka wa hubba 'amalin yuqarribuni ila hubbika.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, Senden kendi sevgini, Seni sevenlerin sevgisini ve beni Senin sevgine yaklaştıracak amellerin sevgisini istiyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ مَالِكَ الْمُلْكِ تُؤْتِي الْمُلْكَ مَنْ تَشَاءُ وَتَنْزِعُ الْمُلْكَ مِمَّنْ تَشَاءُ وَتُعِزُّ مَنْ تَشَاءُ وَتُذِلُّ مَنْ تَشَاءُ بِيَدِكَ الْخَيْرُ إِنَّكَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
englishTranslation: O Allah, Owner of Sovereignty, You grant sovereignty to whom You will and take it away from whom You will. You honor whom You will and humble whom You will. In Your hand is all good. Indeed, You are over all things competent.
germanTranslation: O Allah, Besitzer der Herrschaft, Du gibst die Herrschaft, wem Du willst, und nimmst sie, wem Du willst. Du ehrst, wen Du willst, und erniedrigst, wen Du willst. In Deiner Hand ist alles Gute. Wahrlich, Du hast Macht über alle Dinge.
transliteration: Allahumma malikal-mulki tu'til-mulka man tasha'u wa tanzi'ul-mulka mimman tasha'u wa tu'izzu man tasha'u wa tudhillu man tasha'u biyadikal-khayr, innaka 'ala kulli shay'in qadir.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, mülkün sahibi sensin, mülkü dilediğine verirsin ve dilediğinden alırsın. Dilediğini yüceltir, dilediğini alçaltırsın. Hayır Senin elindedir. Şüphesiz Sen her şeye kadirsin.

arabicText: رَبِّ اشْرَحْ لِي صَدْرِي وَيَسِّرْ لِي أَمْرِي وَاحْلُلْ عُقْدَةً مِنْ لِسَانِي يَفْقَهُوا قَوْلِي
englishTranslation: My Lord, expand my chest for me, ease my task for me, and remove the impediment from my tongue so that they may understand my speech.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, weite mir meine Brust, erleichtere mir meine Aufgabe und löse den Knoten von meiner Zunge, damit sie meine Worte verstehen.
transliteration: Rabbishrah li sadri wa yassir li amri wahlul 'uqdatan min lisanī yafqahu qawli.
turkishTranslation: Rabbim, göğsümü genişlet, işimi kolaylaştır ve dilimden düğümü çöz ki sözümü anlasınlar.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ وَالْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ وَالْبُخْلِ وَالْجُبْنِ وَضَلَعِ الدَّيْنِ وَغَلَبَةِ الرِّجَالِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from distress, grief, incapacity, laziness, miserliness, cowardice, debt, and being overpowered by men.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Kummer, Trauer, Schwäche, Faulheit, Geiz, Feigheit, Schuldenlast und der Unterdrückung durch Menschen.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazani wal-'ajzi wal-kasali wal-bukhli wal-jubni wa dala'id-dayni wa ghalabatir-rijal.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, Senden sıkıntıdan, kederden, acizlikten, tembellikten, cimrilikten, korkaklıktan, borç yükünden ve insanların baskısından sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ فِعْلَ الْخَيْرَاتِ وَتَرْكَ الْمُنْكَرَاتِ وَحُبَّ الْمَسَاكِينِ وَأَنْ تَغْفِرَ لِي وَتَرْحَمَنِي
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for the ability to do good deeds, abandon evil deeds, love the poor, and that You forgive me and have mercy on me.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um die Fähigkeit, Gutes zu tun, Schlechtes zu unterlassen, die Armen zu lieben und dass Du mir vergibst und mir barmherzig bist.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka fi'lal-khayrati wa tarkal-munkarati wa hubbal-masakini wa an taghfira li wa tarhamani.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, Senden iyilik yapmayı, kötülükten uzak durmayı, fakirleri sevmeyi, beni bağışlamanı ve bana merhamet etmeni istiyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ أَصْلِحْ لِي دِينِيَ الَّذِي هُوَ عِصْمَةُ أَمْرِي وَأَصْلِحْ لِي دُنْيَايَ الَّتِي فِيهَا مَعَاشِي وَأَصْلِحْ لِي آخِرَتِي الَّتِي فِيهَا مَعَادِي وَاجْعَلِ الْحَيَاةَ زِيَادَةً لِي فِي كُلِّ خَيْرٍ وَاجْعَلِ الْمَوْتَ رَاحَةً لِي مِنْ كُلِّ شَرٍّ
englishTranslation: O Allah, rectify my religion, which is the safeguard of my affairs, rectify my worldly life, in which is my livelihood, and rectify my Hereafter, to which is my return. Make life an increase for me in every good and make death a relief for me from every evil.
germanTranslation: O Allah, korrigiere meine Religion, die der Schutz meiner Angelegenheiten ist, korrigiere mein weltliches Leben, in dem mein Lebensunterhalt liegt, und korrigiere mein Jenseits, zu dem meine Rückkehr ist. Mache das Leben für mich zu einer Zunahme an jedem Guten und mache den Tod für mich zu einer Erleichterung von allem Übel.
transliteration: Allahumma aslih li diniyalladhi huwa 'ismatu amri wa aslih li dunyaya allati fiha ma'ashi wa aslih li akhirati allati fiha ma'adi waj'alil-hayata ziyadatan li fi kulli khayrin waj'alil-mawta rahatan li min kulli sharrin.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, işlerimin koruyucusu olan dinimi düzelt, geçim kaynağım olan dünyamı düzelt, dönüş yerim olan ahiretimi düzelt. Hayatı her hayırda artış, ölümü de her şerden kurtuluş kıl.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْهُدَى وَالتُّقَى وَالْعَفَافَ وَالْغِنَى
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for guidance, piety, chastity, and self-sufficiency.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Rechtleitung, Gottesfurcht, Keuschheit und Unabhängigkeit.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'alukal-huda wat-tuqa wal-'afafa wal-ghina.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, Senden hidayet, takva, iffet ve zenginlik istiyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ زَيِّنَّا بِزِينَةِ الْإِيمَانِ وَاجْعَلْنَا هُدَاةً مُهْتَدِينَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, adorn us with the adornment of faith and make us guides who are rightly guided.
germanTranslation: O Allah, schmücke uns mit dem Schmuck des Glaubens und mache uns zu rechtgeleiteten Führern.
transliteration: Allahumma zayyinna bizeenatil-imani waj'alna hudaatan muhtadeen.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, bizi imanın ziynetiyle süsle ve bizi doğru yolu bulan ve gösterenlerden eyle.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ حُبَّكَ وَحُبَّ مَنْ يُحِبُّكَ وَالْعَمَلَ الَّذِي يُبَلِّغُنِي حُبَّكَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for Your love, the love of those who love You, and the deeds that will bring me to Your love.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Deine Liebe, die Liebe derer, die Dich lieben, und die Taten, die mich zu Deiner Liebe führen.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka hubbaka wa hubba man yuhibbuka wal-'amalalladhi yuballighuni hubbaka.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, Senden kendi sevgini, Seni sevenlerin sevgisini ve beni Senin sevgine ulaştıracak amelleri istiyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَجْأَةِ الْخَيْرِ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ فَجْأَةِ الشَّرِّ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for sudden goodness, and I seek refuge in You from sudden evil.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um plötzliches Gutes und suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor plötzlichem Übel.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka min faj'atil-khayri wa a'udhu bika min faj'atish-sharr.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, Senden ani hayırlar diliyor ve ani şerlerden Sana sığınıyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ رِضَاكَ وَالْجَنَّةَ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ سَخَطِكَ وَالنَّارِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for Your pleasure and Paradise, and I seek refuge in You from Your anger and the Fire.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Dein Wohlgefallen und das Paradies und suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Deinem Zorn und dem Feuer.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka ridaka wal-jannata wa a'udhu bika min sakhatika wan-nar.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, Senden rızanı ve cenneti istiyorum, gazabından ve cehennemden Sana sığınıyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ خَيْرِ مَا سَأَلَكَ مِنْهُ عِبَادُكَ الصَّالِحُونَ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا اسْتَعَاذَكَ مِنْهُ عِبَادُكَ الصَّالِحُونَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for the good that Your righteous servants have asked You for, and I seek refuge in You from the evil from which Your righteous servants have sought refuge.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um das Gute, das Deine rechtschaffenen Diener von Dir erbeten haben, und ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor dem Übel, vor dem Deine rechtschaffenen Diener Zuflucht gesucht haben.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka min khayri ma sa'alaka minhu 'ibadukas-salihun wa a'udhu bika min sharri ma-sta'adha minhu 'ibadukas-salihun.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, Senden salih kullarının istediği hayırları istiyorum ve salih kullarının sığındığı şerlerden Sana sığınıyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَفْوَ وَالْعَافِيَةَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in this world and the Hereafter.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Vergebung und Wohlergehen im Diesseits und im Jenseits.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'alukal-'afwa wal-'afiyata fid-dunya wal-akhirah.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, Senden dünya ve ahirette af ve afiyet diliyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ فَوَاتِحَ الْخَيْرِ وَخَوَاتِيمَهُ وَجَوَامِعَهُ وَأَوَّلَهُ وَآخِرَهُ وَظَاهِرَهُ وَبَاطِنَهُ وَالدَّرَجَاتِ الْعُلَى مِنَ الْجَنَّةِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for the beginnings of good, its endings, its totality, its first, its last, its apparent, its hidden, and the highest ranks of Paradise.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um die Anfänge des Guten, seine Enden, seine Gesamtheit, sein Erstes, sein Letztes, sein Offensichtliches, sein Verborgenes und die höchsten Stufen des Paradieses.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka fawatiḥal-khayri wa khawatimahu wa jawami'ahu wa awwalahu wa akhirahu wa zahirahu wa batinahu wad-darajatil-'ula minal-jannah.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, Senden hayrın başlangıçlarını, sonuçlarını, toplamını, ilkini, sonunu, zahirini, batınını ve cennetin en yüksek derecelerini istiyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ الْمَسْأَلَةِ وَخَيْرَ الدُّعَاءِ وَخَيْرَ النَّجَاحِ وَخَيْرَ الْعِلْمِ وَخَيْرَ الْعَمَلِ وَخَيْرَ الثَّوَابِ وَخَيْرَ الْحَيَاةِ وَخَيْرَ الْمَمَاتِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for the best of requests, the best of supplications, the best of success, the best of knowledge, the best of deeds, the best of rewards, the best of life, and the best of death.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um das Beste der Bitten, das Beste der Bittgebete, das Beste des Erfolgs, das Beste des Wissens, das Beste der Taten, das Beste der Belohnung, das Beste des Lebens und das Beste des Todes.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka khayral-mas'alati wa khayrad-du'a'i wa khayran-najahi wa khayral-'ilmi wa khayral-'amali wa khayratha-thawabi wa khayral-hayati wa khayral-mamati.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, Senden istenenlerin en hayırlısını, duaların en hayırlısını, başarının en hayırlısını, ilmin en hayırlısını, amellerin en hayırlısını, mükafatın en hayırlısını, hayatın en hayırlısını ve ölümün en hayırlısını istiyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْجَنَّةَ وَمَا قَرَّبَ إِلَيْهَا مِنْ قَوْلٍ أَوْ عَمَلٍ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ النَّارِ وَمَا قَرَّبَ إِلَيْهَا مِنْ قَوْلٍ أَوْ عَمَلٍ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for Paradise and for that which brings one closer to it, in word and deed, and I seek refuge in You from Hell and from that which brings one closer to it, in word and deed.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um das Paradies und um das, was einem im Wort und in der Tat näher dazu bringt, und ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor der Hölle und vor dem, was einem im Wort und in der Tat näher dazu bringt.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'alukal-jannata wa ma qarraba ilayha min qawlin aw 'amalin wa a'udhu bika minan-nari wa ma qarraba ilayha min qawlin aw 'amalin.
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, Senden cenneti ve ona yaklaştıran söz ve amelleri istiyorum, cehennemden ve ona yaklaştıran söz ve amellerden Sana sığınıyorum.

arabicText: رَبِّ إِنِّي ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِي فَاغْفِرْ لِي
englishTranslation: O my Lord, indeed I have wronged myself, so forgive me.
germanTranslation: O mein Herr, ich habe mir selbst Unrecht getan, so vergib mir.
transliteration: Rabbee innee zalamtu nafsee faghfir lee
turkishTranslation: Rabbim, gerçekten kendime zulmettim, beni bağışla.

arabicText: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْهِ
englishTranslation: I seek forgiveness from Allah and repent to Him.
germanTranslation: Ich bitte Allah um Vergebung und bereue vor Ihm.
transliteration: Astaghfirullah wa atoobu ilayh
turkishTranslation: Allah'tan bağışlanma diliyor ve O'na tövbe ediyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِي ظُلْمًا كَثِيرًا، وَلاَ يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ، فَاغْفِرْ لِي مَغْفِرَةً مِنْ عِنْدِكَ، وَارْحَمْنِي، إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الغَفُورُ الرَّحِيمُ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I have wronged myself greatly, and none forgives sins except You. So grant me forgiveness from You and have mercy on me. Indeed, You are the Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich habe mir selbst großes Unrecht getan, und niemand vergibt die Sünden außer Dir. So gewähre mir Vergebung von Dir und habe Erbarmen mit mir. Wahrlich, Du bist der Allvergebende, der Barmherzige.
transliteration: Allahumma innee zalamtu nafsee thulman katheera, wa la yaghfirudh-dhunuba illa anta, faghfirlee maghfiratan min 'indika, warhamnee, innaka antal-Ghafoorur-Raheem
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, kendime çok zulmettim, günahları ancak Sen bağışlarsın. Bana katından bir mağfiret ver ve bana merhamet et. Şüphesiz Sen, çok bağışlayansın, çok merhametlisin.

arabicText: رَبَّنَا ظَلَمْنَا أَنْفُسَنَا وَإِنْ لَمْ تَغْفِرْ لَنَا وَتَرْحَمْنَا لَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ الْخَاسِرِينَ
englishTranslation: Our Lord, we have wronged ourselves, and if You do not forgive us and have mercy upon us, we will surely be among the losers.
germanTranslation: Unser Herr, wir haben uns selbst Unrecht getan, und wenn Du uns nicht vergibst und uns nicht barmherzig bist, werden wir gewiss unter den Verlierern sein.
transliteration: Rabbana thalamna anfusana wa-in lam taghfir lana watarhamna lanakoonanna mina alkhasireen
turkishTranslation: Rabbimiz, biz kendimize zulmettik. Eğer bizi bağışlamaz ve bize merhamet etmezsen, mutlaka hüsrana uğrayanlardan oluruz.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي خَطِيئَتِي وَجَهْلِي، وَإِسْرَافِي فِي أَمْرِي، وَمَا أَنْتَ أَعْلَمُ بِهِ مِنِّي، اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي جِدِّي وَهَزْلِي، وَخَطَئِي وَعَمْدِي، وَكُلُّ ذَلِكَ عِنْدِي
englishTranslation: O Allah, forgive my mistakes, my ignorance, my excesses in my affairs, and what You know better than me. O Allah, forgive my seriousness and my jest, my errors and my intentional sins, for all of that is from me.
germanTranslation: O Allah, vergib mir meine Fehler, meine Unwissenheit, mein Übermaß in meinen Angelegenheiten und das, was Du besser weißt als ich. O Allah, vergib mir mein Ernst und meinen Scherz, meine Versehen und meine vorsätzlichen Sünden, denn all das ist von mir.
transliteration: Allahumma-ghfir lee khatee'atee wa jahlee, wa israafee fee amree, wa ma anta a'lamu bihi minnee. Allahumma-ghfir lee jiddi wa hazlee, wa khata'ee wa 'amdee, wa kullu thalika 'indee
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, hatalarımı, cehaletimi, işlerimdeki aşırılıklarımı ve Senin benden daha iyi bildiklerini bağışla. Allah'ım, ciddi halimi, şakalarımı, hatalarımı ve kasıtlı günahlarımı bağışla, çünkü bunların hepsi benden kaynaklanmıştır.

arabicText: سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِكَ، أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ، أَسْتَغْفِرُكَ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْكَ
englishTranslation: Glory be to You, O Allah, and praise be to You. I bear witness that there is no deity but You. I seek Your forgiveness and repent to You.
germanTranslation: Preis sei Dir, O Allah, und Lob sei Dir. Ich bezeuge, dass es keinen Gott gibt außer Dir. Ich bitte Dich um Vergebung und bereue vor Dir.
transliteration: Subhanaka Allahumma wa bihamdika, ash-hadu an la ilaha illa anta, astaghfiruka wa atoobu ilayk
turkishTranslation: Seni eksikliklerden tenzih ederim Allah'ım ve Sana hamd ederim. Şahitlik ederim ki Senden başka ilah yoktur. Senden bağışlanma diliyor ve Sana tövbe ediyorum.

arabicText: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَتُبْ عَلَيَّ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ
englishTranslation: My Lord, forgive me and accept my repentance, for You are the Accepter of Repentance, the Most Merciful.
germanTranslation: Mein Herr, vergib mir und nimm meine Reue an, denn Du bist der Reue-Annehmende, der Barmherzige.
transliteration: Rabbighfir lee watub 'alayya innaka antat-Tawwabur-Raheem
turkishTranslation: Rabbim, beni bağışla ve tövbemi kabul et. Şüphesiz Sen, tövbeleri kabul edensin, çok merhametlisin.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ بِأَنَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدَ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ، وَحْدَكَ لاَ شَرِيكَ لَكَ، الْمَنَّانُ، يَا بَدِيعَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالأَرْضِ، يَا ذَا الْجَلالِ وَالإِكْرَامِ، يَا حَيُّ يَا قَيُّومُ، إِنِّي ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِي فَاغْفِرْ لِي
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You by the fact that all praise is Yours, there is no deity but You alone, with no partner, the Bestower of Favors, O Originator of the heavens and the earth, O Possessor of Majesty and Honor, O Ever-Living, O Sustainer, I have wronged myself, so forgive me.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich dadurch, dass aller Lobpreis Dir gehört, es gibt keinen Gott außer Dir allein, ohne Partner, der Wohltäter, O Schöpfer der Himmel und der Erde, O Besitzer der Majestät und der Ehre, O Ewiglebende, O Erhalter, ich habe mir selbst Unrecht getan, so vergib mir.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka bi-anna lakal-hamd, la ilaha illa anta, wahdaka la shareeka lak, al-Mannan, ya Badi'as-samawati wal-ard, ya Dhal-Jalali wal-Ikram, ya Hayyu ya Qayyum, inni zalamtu nafsee faghfir lee
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, Sana hamdın yalnızca Sana ait olduğu, Senden başka ilah olmadığı, ortağın bulunmadığı, nimetler veren, ey göklerin ve yerin yaratıcısı, ey Celal ve İkram sahibi, ey Hayy ve Kayyum olan Allah'ım, kendime zulmettim, beni bağışla.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْجُبْنِ وَالْبُخْلِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ غَلَبَةِ الدَّيْنِ وَقَهْرِ الرِّجَالِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from grief and sorrow, from weakness and laziness, from cowardice and miserliness, and from being overpowered by debt and the oppression of men.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Kummer und Traurigkeit, vor Schwäche und Faulheit, vor Feigheit und Geiz, und davor, von Schulden überwältigt zu werden und vor der Unterdrückung durch Menschen.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'oodhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazan, wa a'oodhu bika minal-'ajzi wal-kasal, wa a'oodhu bika minal-jubni wal-bukhl, wa a'oodhu bika min ghalabatid-dayn wa qahrir-rijal
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, kederden ve hüzünden, acizlikten ve tembellikten, korkaklıktan ve cimrilikten, borç altında ezilmekten ve insanların baskısından Sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ طَهِّرْنِي مِنَ الذُّنُوبِ وَالْخَطَايَا كَمَا يُنَقَّى الثَّوْبُ الأَبْيَضُ مِنَ الدَّنَسِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, purify me from sins and mistakes as a white garment is purified from filth.
germanTranslation: O Allah, reinige mich von Sünden und Fehlern, wie ein weißes Gewand von Schmutz gereinigt wird.
transliteration: Allahumma tahhirnee minadh-dhunubi wal-khataaya kama yunaqqath-thawbul-abyadu minad-danas
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, beyaz elbisenin kirden temizlendiği gibi beni günahlardan ve hatalardan temizle.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ التَّوْبَةَ وَالْمُعَافَاةَ وَالْعَافِيَةَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالآخِرَةِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for repentance, well-being, and safety in this world and the Hereafter.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Reue, Wohlergehen und Sicherheit in dieser Welt und im Jenseits.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'alukat-tawbata wal-mu'aafata wal-'aafiyata fid-dunya wal-akhirah
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, Senden tövbe, afiyet ve dünya ile ahirette sağlık diliyorum.

arabicText: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
englishTranslation: Our Lord, grant us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.
germanTranslation: Unser Herr, gib uns Gutes in dieser Welt und Gutes im Jenseits, und bewahre uns vor der Strafe des Feuers.
transliteration: Rabbana atina fid-dunya hasanatan wa fil-akhirati hasanatan wa qina 'adhaban-nar
turkishTranslation: Rabbimiz, bize dünyada iyilik ver, ahirette de iyilik ver ve bizi ateşin azabından koru.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ، خَلَقْتَنِي وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ، وَأَنَا عَلَى عَهْدِكَ وَوَعْدِكَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُ، أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا صَنَعْتُ، أَبُوءُ لَكَ بِنِعْمَتِكَ عَلَيَّ، وَأَبُوءُ بِذَنْبِي فَاغْفِرْ لِي فَإِنَّهُ لاَ يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is no deity but You. You created me, and I am Your servant. I abide by Your covenant and promise as much as I can. I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done. I acknowledge Your favor upon me, and I confess my sins. So forgive me, for none forgives sins except You.
germanTranslation: O Allah, Du bist mein Herr, es gibt keinen Gott außer Dir. Du hast mich erschaffen, und ich bin Dein Diener. Ich halte mich an Deinen Bund und Dein Versprechen, so gut ich kann. Ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor dem Bösen dessen, was ich getan habe. Ich gestehe Deine Gunst mir gegenüber und bekenne meine Sünden. So vergib mir, denn niemand vergibt die Sünden außer Dir.
transliteration: Allahumma anta Rabbi, la ilaha illa anta, khalaqtani wa ana 'abduka, wa ana 'ala 'ahdika wa wa'dika mastata'tu, a'oodhu bika min sharri ma sana'tu, aboo'u laka bini'matika 'alayya, wa aboo'u bidhanbee, faghfir lee fa innahu la yaghfirudh-dhunuba illa anta
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, Sen benim Rabbimsin, Senden başka ilah yoktur. Beni Sen yarattın ve ben Senin kulunum. Gücüm yettiğince Senin ahdine ve vaadine bağlıyım. Yaptıklarımın kötülüğünden Sana sığınırım. Bana olan nimetini itiraf ediyor, günahlarımı da kabul ediyorum. Beni bağışla, çünkü günahları ancak Sen bağışlarsın.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنَ الْخَيْرِ كُلِّهِ عَاجِلِهِ وَآجِلِهِ مَا عَلِمْتُ مِنْهُ وَمَا لَمْ أَعْلَمْ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الشَّرِّ كُلِّهِ عَاجِلِهِ وَآجِلِهِ مَا عَلِمْتُ مِنْهُ وَمَا لَمْ أَعْلَمْ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for all that is good, in this world and the next, what I know of it and what I do not know. And I seek refuge in You from all that is evil, in this world and the next, what I know of it and what I do not know.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um alles Gute, in dieser Welt und im Jenseits, was ich davon weiß und was ich nicht weiß. Und ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor allem Bösen, in dieser Welt und im Jenseits, was ich davon weiß und was ich nicht weiß.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka minal-khayri kullihi 'ajilihi wa ajilihi ma 'alimtu minhu wa ma lam a'lam, wa a'oodhu bika minash-sharri kullihi 'ajilihi wa ajilihi ma 'alimtu minhu wa ma lam a'lam
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, Senden her türlü hayrı isterim; dünya ve ahirette, bildiğim ve bilmediğim bütün iyilikleri. Ve her türlü şerden Sana sığınırım; dünya ve ahirette, bildiğim ve bilmediğim bütün kötülüklerden.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْهُدَى وَالتُّقَى وَالْعَفَافَ وَالْغِنَى
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for guidance, piety, chastity, and self-sufficiency.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Rechtleitung, Gottesfurcht, Keuschheit und Unabhängigkeit.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'alukal-huda wat-tuqa wal-'afaaf wal-ghina
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, Senden hidayet, takva, iffet ve zenginlik (gönül zenginliği) diliyorum.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ أَصْلِحْ لِي دِينِيَ الَّذِي هُوَ عِصْمَةُ أَمْرِي، وَأَصْلِحْ لِي دُنْيَايَ الَّتِي فِيهَا مَعَاشِي، وَأَصْلِحْ لِي آخِرَتِي الَّتِي فِيهَا مَعَادِي، وَاجْعَلِ الْحَيَاةَ زِيَادَةً لِي فِي كُلِّ خَيْرٍ، وَاجْعَلِ الْمَوْتَ رَاحَةً لِي مِنْ كُلِّ شَرٍّ
englishTranslation: O Allah, rectify my religion, which is the safeguard of my affairs. Rectify my worldly life, in which is my livelihood. Rectify my Hereafter, in which is my return. Make life an increase for me in every good, and make death a relief for me from every evil.
germanTranslation: O Allah, verbessere meine Religion, die der Schutz meiner Angelegenheiten ist. Verbessere mein weltliches Leben, in dem mein Lebensunterhalt liegt. Verbessere mein Jenseits, in das ich zurückkehren werde. Mache das Leben für mich zu einer Zunahme an allem Guten, und mache den Tod für mich zu einer Erleichterung von allem Bösen.
transliteration: Allahumma aslih lee deeniyal-ladhi huwa 'ismatu amree, wa aslih lee dunyaya-l-lati feeha ma'ashee, wa aslih lee akhirati-l-lati feeha ma'aadee, waj'alil-hayata ziyadatan lee fee kulli khayr, waj'alil-mawta raahatan lee min kulli sharr
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, işlerimin koruyucusu olan dinimi düzelt. Geçim kaynağım olan dünyamı düzelt. Dönüş yerim olan ahiretimi düzelt. Hayatı her hayırda artış vesilesi kıl, ölümü de her şerden kurtuluş vesilesi eyle.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ زَوَالِ نِعْمَتِكَ، وَتَحَوُّلِ عَافِيَتِكَ، وَفُجَاءَةِ نِقْمَتِكَ، وَجَمِيعِ سَخَطِكَ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the removal of Your blessings, the change in Your protection, the suddenness of Your punishment, and all forms of Your displeasure.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir davor, dass Deine Gaben verschwinden, Dein Schutz sich ändert, Deine Strafe plötzlich kommt und vor allem, was Deinen Zorn erregt.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'oodhu bika min zawali ni'matik, wa tahawwuli 'afiyatik, wa fuja'ati niqmatik, wa jamee'i sakhatik
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, nimetlerinin yok olmasından, afiyetinin değişmesinden, cezanın ansızın gelmesinden ve bütün gazabından Sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْكَسَلِ، وَالْهَرَمِ، وَالْمَأْثَمِ، وَالْمَغْرَمِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from laziness, old age, sinfulness, and debt.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Faulheit, Altersschwäche, Sündhaftigkeit und Schulden.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'oodhu bika minal-kasal, wal-haram, wal-ma'tham, wal-maghram
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, tembellikten, yaşlılıktan, günahtan ve borçtan Sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عِلْمٍ لاَ يَنْفَعُ، وَمِنْ قَلْبٍ لاَ يَخْشَعُ، وَمِنْ نَفْسٍ لاَ تَشْبَعُ، وَمِنْ دَعْوَةٍ لاَ يُسْتَجَابُ لَهَا
englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from knowledge that does not benefit, from a heart that does not fear, from a soul that is never satisfied, and from a supplication that is not answered.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor nutzlosem Wissen, einem Herzen ohne Ehrfurcht, einer unersättlichen Seele und einem Gebet, das nicht erhört wird.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'oodhu bika min 'ilmin la yanfa', wa min qalbin la yakhsha', wa min nafsin la tashba', wa min da'watin la yustajabu laha
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, faydasız ilimden, huşu duymayan kalpten, doymayan nefisten ve kabul olunmayan duadan Sana sığınırım.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ فِعْلَ الْخَيْرَاتِ، وَتَرْكَ الْمُنْكَرَاتِ، وَحُبَّ الْمَسَاكِينِ، وَأَنْ تَغْفِرَ لِي وَتَرْحَمَنِي، وَإِذَا أَرَدْتَ فِتْنَةَ قَوْمٍ فَتَوَفَّنِي غَيْرَ مَفْتُونٍ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You to enable me to do good deeds, abandon evil deeds, love the poor, and that You forgive me and have mercy on me. And when You will a trial for a people, take me without being afflicted.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich darum, gute Taten zu vollbringen, schlechte Taten zu unterlassen, die Armen zu lieben, und dass Du mir vergibst und Dich meiner erbarmst. Und wenn Du eine Prüfung über ein Volk bringen willst, dann nimm mich zu Dir, ohne dass ich davon betroffen bin.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka fi'lal-khayrat, wa tarkal-munkarat, wa hubbal-masakeen, wa an taghfira lee wa tarhamanee, wa idha aradta fitnata qawmin fatawaffanee ghayra maftoon
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, Senden hayırlı işler yapmayı, kötülükleri terk etmeyi, fakirleri sevmeyi, beni bağışlamanı ve bana merhamet etmeni istiyorum. Bir kavme fitne vermek istediğinde, beni fitneye uğramadan vefat ettir.

arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ رِضَاكَ وَالْجَنَّةَ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ سَخَطِكَ وَالنَّارِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You for Your pleasure and Paradise, and I seek refuge in You from Your displeasure and the Fire.
germanTranslation: O Allah, ich bitte Dich um Dein Wohlgefallen und das Paradies, und ich suche Zuflucht bei Dir vor Deinem Zorn und dem Feuer.
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka ridaka wal-jannah, wa a'oodhu bika min sakhatika wan-nar
turkishTranslation: Allah'ım, Senden rızanı ve cenneti istiyorum. Gazabından ve ateşten Sana sığınıyorum.
